title: Morpheus ‚Äì The App to assist psychotherapy
description:
One of the most effective treatment methods for borderline and trauma related disorders is the Dialectical Behavioral Therapy for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (DBT-PTSD). It effectively treats PTSD and borderline. 

Morpheus is the app that assists DBT-PTBS treatment and all forms of therapy that use exposures.

Morpheus was developed together with the inventor of DBT-PTSD, researchers of the Central Institute of Mental Health and their patients. Read our scientific publication about the app in the JMIR Journal (2016): http://mental.jmir.org/2016/2/e27/

No matter if you are in treatment for borderline, post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), etc. Morpheus supports various forms of trauma therapy, such as Prolonged Exposure (PE) and Narrative Exposure Therapy (NET), as well as in a dialectical behavioural therapy (DBT) setting.

Features: 1) Record the therapy session with your therapist and listen to it again later to process what you have experienced. 2) Assess your feelings before, after and during listening. 3) See the course of therapy in your statistics. 4) You can stop listening at any time to change your mind through mini-games. 

Warning: Morpheus is intended to be used within a therapy guided by a qualified expert. Morpheus is not meant to be used without such professional psychotherapy. We strongly advise against using Morpheus for "self-therapy". Morpheus is not a replacement for a therapist. For more information read the following section about Morpheus' purpose definition.

Purpose definition
This section describes the differentiation of Morpheus from a medical device, specifically from a medical app, by a purpose definition according to ¬ß3 No.10 MPG. The differentiation is based on the guidance provided by the BfArM.

What Morpheus is intended for
+ Morpheus stores audio recordings made by the user. This function is intended for use during a psychotherapy session, subject to the consent of the persons present. The recording is archived by Morpheus so that the user can listen to it again later to remember the previous therapy session.
+ Morpheus stores user self-assessments before, after and during listening to an archived audio recording. These self-assessments serve two different purposes: (i) The assessment before and after listening is archived and displayed to the user to provide motivating feedback to the user about his or her feelings during the course of the therapy. With the user's consent, the therapist can gain insight into the self-assessments collected. This data is only communicated, no treatment recommendation is derived based on this data. (ii) The assessment during the listening is used to offer the user a distraction when a certain value is exceeded, so that he or she can distance him- or herself from what he or she has just heard. The user can reject the offer and continue listening.

What Morpheus is not intended for
Morpheus does not meet the criteria used to classify a medical app according to ¬ß3 No. 1 MPG. The purpose of Morpheus is not intended for:
- Detection, prevention, surveillance, treatment or alleviation of disease,
- Detection, monitoring, treatment, relief or compensation of injuries or disabilities,
- Examination, replacement or modification of the anatomical structure or a physiological process,
- Conception control.

Furthermore, the purpose of Morpheus is not intended for: 
- Decision support or independent decision making, e.g. with regard to therapeutic measures,
- Calculation e.g. of drug dosages (in contrast to the pure reproduction of a table from which the user derives the dosage himself),
- Monitoring of a patient and data collection, e.g. by recording measured values, if the results influence diagnosis or therapy.

title: JEFIT Workout Tracker, Weight Lifting, Gym Log App
description:
Tracking workout training routines using JEFIT gym log is easy. Programs from bodybuilding, 3 day splits, 5x5 & strength plans to home exercises & body weight lifting.

‚òÖ Google Play Editor's Choice ‚òÖ Men‚Äôs Fitness - Best Fitness and Health Apps ‚òÖ USA Today - New year, new you

Over 8 million people use JEFIT to track their workouts and transform their bodies.

JEFIT, the number one workout tracking planner app, provides free fitness program database to help you stay fit, make progress and get the most out of your gym or home fitness sessions. From beginner programs like 5x5, 531, stronglifts, 3 or 4 day splits, starting strength to advanced bodybuilding, weightlifting, powerlifting or kettlebell routines to programs using bodyweight, limited space or specialized equipment, JEFIT is the only workout app you need.

Who is this app for?
If you‚Äôve logged your workouts in a journal, planner or just love training at the gym on your own schedule, JEFIT will help you reach your strength, weight and fat loss, and training goals from beginners to advanced lifters. We‚Äôve made the app to motivate you by rewarding you for consistency, pushing yourself to new personal records and committing to challenges with the community.

comments: Used this apps for a couple of years and the latest updates are a backward step. The UI no longer displays the interval time but been replaced with an incremental number for those who can't count sets. I use to enter the weight for my next set during the interval however the keyboard won't appear while the interval timer is on. Also none of the graphics for the exercises display anymore which has caused me confusion. I hope the latest updates are reconsidered

Been using this app since the early days. I love the ongoing support but it wouldnt hurt for devs to stick to one UI and stop moving things around every other update. The latest update to intervals is just lazy. The timer auto-starts even if you dont want/need it and is always logged. A better approach would be to disable the time+logging if interval is set to 0, otherwise there is a x second delay before timer starts. Also the ability to set the main page under excerise history would be great.

Nice app an community. There must be a bug with the points earned: with the latest versions my sessions are not counted anylonger (and I do train every day almost...) Would be nice to get it resolved (I am in the contest, and it gives motivation ;) Overall, is a very good develooment, kudos to the team.

It's a good app, but it can be hard to use. I also couldn't find a way to contact them from the app and I feel like if you're going to charge people money you have to put a way to contact you if they have a problem or question. My husband just wants to know if there is a weekly report for reps like the other stats, but it makes me nervous that if something goes wrong I can't find a way to contact them about it.

Great app!!! Have been using for years. Really enjoy the improvements made over the years. Unfortunately, body stats page/functions have been very buggy and don't even work the last few updates. Weight doesn't record. Graph has goal weight posted way off in future. Weight no longer sync's w Google Fit. Could be 5star app. -2stars until fixed.

title: Dino ABC and puzzles
description:
Dino ABC and Puzzles - a game created for children and preschoolers, learning English.
In this application, children can learn English letters.

This is an arcade and adventure game of the Jurassic period with a lot of mazes.
There are beautiful levels here, such as: a city, a cave, a forest, a pond, a lake, an ice,  a planet and many others.

A Dino collects letters spoken in English.
A Dino can jump, run, play and find other dinosaurs, such as: triceratops, diplodocus, tyrannosaurus (T-Rex), euoplocephalus, brachiosaurus, velociraptor, spinosaurus, pteranodon, parasaurolophus, lyopleurorodon.

Also in the game there are fantastic spiders, giant bats, dangerous dragonflies and flies.
All animals are made in the style of animation.

As a reward, after the completion of the mazes, the player must burst balloons.
The letters are drawn on balloons. The balloons can explode with sound.

Another part of the game is a fun and addictive three in a row game in a convenient for children control.
The player must move letters and things to get three identical elements in a row. If there are difficulties, there is always a clue.

The things can burst, such as: an ant,  an orange, a walnut, an umbrella, a flower, an ice cream, a banana, a ball,  a mandarin, a strawberries, a cat, a fish, a donut, a owl, a grapes, a lemon, a jellyfish, a zebra, a heart, a tomato, a star, a hare , a pumpkin, a pig, a mango, a ladybug, a kiwi, a jam, a corn, an apple.

The last part of the game is puzzles. There are 2 types of puzzles. Puzzle with the creation of letters from pieces and a puzzle with the image of dinosaurs. At the end of the game there is the whole English alphabet, which is going to the puzzle.

The application Dino ABC and Puzzles will help you easily remember English letters.


FUNCTIONS:

- Learn letters from A to Z
- Animated characters
- Fun games with music
- Amazing Jurassic dinosaurs.
- 14 2D levels, playing as a Dino
- 28 puzzles
- 28 levels of balloons.
- 28 levels of the three in a row genre.
- Free app.
descriptionHTML:
Dino ABC and Puzzles - a game created for children and preschoolers, learning English.
In this application, children can learn English letters.

This is an arcade and adventure game of the Jurassic period with a lot of mazes.
There are beautiful levels here, such as: a city, a cave, a forest, a pond, a lake, an ice, a planet and many others.

A Dino collects letters spoken in English.
A Dino can jump, run, play and find other dinosaurs, such as: triceratops, diplodocus, tyrannosaurus (T-Rex), euoplocephalus, brachiosaurus, velociraptor, spinosaurus, pteranodon, parasaurolophus, lyopleurorodon.

Also in the game there are fantastic spiders, giant bats, dangerous dragonflies and flies.
All animals are made in the style of animation.

As a reward, after the completion of the mazes, the player must burst balloons.
The letters are drawn on balloons. The balloons can explode with sound.

Another part of the game is a fun and addictive three in a row game in a convenient for children control.
The player must move letters and things to get three identical elements in a row. If there are difficulties, there is always a clue.

The things can burst, such as: an ant, an orange, a walnut, an umbrella, a flower, an ice cream, a banana, a ball, a mandarin, a strawberries, a cat, a fish, a donut, a owl, a grapes, a lemon, a jellyfish, a zebra, a heart, a tomato, a star, a hare , a pumpkin, a pig, a mango, a ladybug, a kiwi, a jam, a corn, an apple.

The last part of the game is puzzles. There are 2 types of puzzles. Puzzle with the creation of letters from pieces and a puzzle with the image of dinosaurs. At the end of the game there is the whole English alphabet, which is going to the puzzle.

The application Dino ABC and Puzzles will help you easily remember English letters.


FUNCTIONS:

- Learn letters from A to Z
- Animated characters
- Fun games with music
- Amazing Jurassic dinosaurs.
- 14 2D levels, playing as a Dino
- 28 puzzles
- 28 levels of balloons.
- 28 levels of the three in a row genre.
- Free app.
summary: Dino ABC and puzzles is the game for children and people learning English.

title: Talking ABA Cards - Kids Language Learning Cards
description:
Talking ABA Cards - Kids Language Learning ABA Flash Cards

Talking ABA Cards help kids learn vocabulary, language and build their memory faster than any other app. Talking Cards is designed on proven communication and language training concepts for children.  It helps kids learn language quick, build early needed vocabulary to accelerate language learning and communication.  Children learn to talk fast using Talking Cards.  This app has also been a great tool for children who have difficulties in verbal communication or have learning difficulties.

Talking Cards helps kids to learn indicating their emotion/intention and learn related vocabularies and grammar at the same time while building a strong Visual Memory for them.

This app has been developed from the actual cards used in several such speech therapy and language training educational institutions and is based on the feedback, tips and instructions received from numerous trainers and educationalists and speech therapists who have worked for years with numerous children making them verbal and actively communicating from non verbal and non communicating.  Now with the help of Talking Cards everybody can use these proven special flash cards to learn and teach communication and speech anywhere at anytime.

We are continuously working in improving Talking Cards based on the feedback from therapists and teachers, who specialize in kids development and education and we also review and incorporate valuable feedback from Talking Card users who help us making this app great for every kid who is beginning to learn to talk or struggling to learn to talk and speak.

Special features of Talking Cards:

üìå All cards include a voice / sound. 
üìå The app supports multiple language ascent so you can switch to whichever language ascent is appropriate to your kids learning.
üìå Talking Cards does not restrict your learning to provided flash cards but you can make your own cards with your own pictures.
üìå Talking Cards provide option to build your own Talking Cards Deck for your selective cards to make it a targeted learning.
üìå App is regularly updated to include new Talking Cards and features to make your kids learning experience more enjoyable.
üìå Well organized Talking Cards is a great teaching tool for all speech therapists working with kids having special conditions like AUTISM, ASD, ADHD, Dyslexia etc.

Feel free to get in touch with us. Hope you enjoy our app.

If you like it please share with your friends and people who need such app for their kids.

Thank you!

title: TSheets Time Tracker
description:
Manage time & log hours with ease! TSheets time tracker for work is a cloud-based time tracking and scheduling app for employees that allows them to clock in and out each work day from their smartphones. With TSheets as the work clock, employees can easily track work hours, create a work log and even track PTO - More than your usual time clock app.

ONLINE TIMESHEETS ‚è≤Ô∏è
 Time logging has never been easier - The TSheets time clock app allows you to replace paper timesheets with accurate, electronic time data and makes payroll and invoicing faster and more affordable. The TSheets time tracking app also accurately tracks time and GPS locations. So, why track work hours manually? Install this time clock app, calculate timesheets automatically and manage time for quick bookkeeping with the best time tracking software. 

SOPHISTICATED TIME RECORDING ‚è≤Ô∏è
Here are some features that make TSheets the best app for tracking work hours: use TSheets time clock features - clock in and out to track work hours, change job codes, edit digital timesheets, view time tracking reports and changes to the work schedule and even track PTO. Time recording is easy with this time tracker app.
‚Ä¢ Track time against multi-level job codes, projects, locations, clients, and more.
‚Ä¢ Track employee hours accurately with a real-time online time clock.
‚Ä¢ Easily switch between job codes, pause time tracking, or take a break.

MANAGE TIME ‚è≤Ô∏è
The TSheets time tracker makes time management a breeze for employers. Save, on average, 6% on gross payroll costs and save three hours per week managing employee time.
TRACK TIME: 
‚Ä¢ Edit, delete, or approve timesheets online to create a time log.
‚Ä¢ Track vacation time, sick time, and holiday time accruals for employees.
REPORT TIME:
‚Ä¢ View time tracker timer history with map.
‚Ä¢ Easily access a breakdown of employee hours by employee, job, customer, or location.
‚Ä¢ Get notifications if employees don‚Äôt clock in to a job or shift as scheduled or approach overtime limits.
‚Ä¢ See day and week totals at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Keep a black-box history of all timesheet edits and deletions, in case of an audit.

SCHEDULE ANYWHERE ‚è≤Ô∏è
The TSheets time tracker also features in-app employee scheduling that allows employers to manage a schedule anywhere and anytime. Features include: drag and drop shifts, assign jobs, and send alerts to managers if employees haven‚Äôt clocked in as scheduled.
‚Ä¢ Schedule builder: Schedule by job or by shift.
‚Ä¢ In-app work scheduling lets employees easily clock in and clock out of assigned jobs or shifts right from the schedule.
‚Ä¢ Notifications let employees know when a new work schedule is published or if a shift is changed.

SIGN UP ‚è≤Ô∏è
This time tracking and scheduling app requires a TSheets account. Sign up now on the app or at https://www.tsheets.com for a free trial with no credit card required. (Or if you have just 1 user, sign up for a free account!)

ALSO INCLUDED ‚è≤Ô∏è
‚Ä¢ Seamless integrations with QuickBooks Online and QuickBooks for PC (Pro, Premier, and Enterprise) for quick bookkeeping.
‚Ä¢ QuickBooks, Square, and Gusto integrations (and more!) to simplify your back office processes.
‚Ä¢ Sync your schedule with Apple iCal, Microsoft Outlook, or Google Calendar for seamless time management.
‚Ä¢ Integrations with popular payroll, accounting, invoicing software.
‚Ä¢ Powerful, real-time reports in multiple formats (PDF, CSV, online, HTML).
‚Ä¢ Safe data storage and detailed time logs protect you in the event of a labor dispute or audit.
‚Ä¢ Configurations for DCAA/DOL compliance.
‚Ä¢ Developer-open API.

SUPPORT, CUSTOMER RATED ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê
TSheets offers free unlimited phone, email, and chat support to all of our customers. Have a question? We‚Äôre happy to help! 

Customer Reviews: http://www.tsheets.com/reviews 
Phone: 888.836.2720
DIY Online Support: http://help.tsheets.com
Email: help@tsheets.com 
Webinars: Register for TSheets free, weekly webinars at https://www.tsheets.com/webinars

recentChanges: We squashed those pesky bugs that were causing the app to crash for some of you.
comments: Freezes up every time try to check week time clock and scroll through jobs. Makes checking in a pain in the a$$ Update... 3 updates in the few weeks and still bugs. I'm not able to balance out my crew because I cant check week totals. All these changes to this app are making me want to find a new program.

Ever since they updated with qb security, it takes way too long to log in. Why do I need a verification code EVERY TIME I log in! It's as bad as QuickBooks now. My bank doesn't require a verification code every single time and they are infinitely way more important than QuickBooks or Tsheets. You guys act like you need this much security. Qb is a terrible company. I hope I find another service soon so I can dump them.

After the Tsheets has joined with Intuit it has locked myself and most of my staff out. As we use it for payroll you can imagine the headache. Periodic downtimes, schedule duplication if you have it on separate devices, or making changes that simply disappear are all common issues. Not clocking out or back in or from job to job is an issue for the field as well. I and my office spend more time on this app than needed to. Use another service.

So far this app has been great. Only had it crash once, but once the update came in it was fixed. The only tiny issue i have now is when i clock in it delays a minute before clocking me in causing me to be a minute late. However i'm not entirely sure if that's the app or just my phone.

Horrible since Quickbooks bought the company. I have been a Tsheets user for 3 years. Before QB, it was wonderful and had immediate phone support. QB's made changes to login and have to generate a QB account and even then they email you a verification code every time you try and login. There is no longer any telephone support and have pushed everyone to online chat. My last chat experience took 38 minutes to get a hold of someone.

title: Hangman Kid's App for Spelling Word Practice
description:
Spelling Bug Hangman helps kids with spelling practice by using the classic hangman word game.

100% Money Back Guarantee - You love it or your money back! Read more here: http://aceedutainmentapps.com/support.html 

The world‚Äôs favorite kid‚Äôs spelling practice game just got a whole lot better. Do spelling practice for school or just for fun! Play alone or with a friend. See if you can guess all the letters to spell the mystery word before the caterpillar chomps through the vine and makes the baby butterfly fall. Every time you guess a letter in the word correctly, the chrysalis will grow a little, but, watch out, every time you guess wrong the caterpillar will chomp on the vine! You are in luck though‚Äîyou earn coins to buy clues that will help you free the butterfly. Oh, and did we tell you that you can find your very own super cute avatar bug to play with?

Spelling Bug Hangman - spelling practice with over 100 built in word lists for children ages 5 to 10. This spelling game also helps kids with dyslexia and ESL students learn

‚Ä¢ Learning in a fun way using an old favorite spelling practice for kids
‚Ä¢ Add your own spelling words. Perfect for practicing your homework words!
‚Ä¢ Record your own voice clues. 
‚Ä¢ Play Spelling Bug Hangman with a friend or on your own and learn while you play
‚Ä¢ See many different clues, including pictures, sound and word shapes to solve the spelling word
‚Ä¢ Follow your progress and show your teacher/parents how much you have learnt
‚Ä¢ Hangman matches your skills level automatically.
‚Ä¢ Whether you are a spelling bee star or someone who struggles with dyslexia or an ESL student, this word game will help you learn

‚Ä¢ Do spelling practice and follow your progress. Show your teacher/parents how much you have learnt with this word game
‚Ä¢ This game is great for English Second Language learners and kids with dyslexia because of the picture clues
‚Ä¢ Awarded KID SAFE ‚Äì no annoying ads or links to the internet
‚Ä¢ See you kids learn new sounds and words FAST - Designed by teachers using the phonics method.
‚Ä¢ The teacher that developed this app specializes in teaching kids with learning difficulties like dyslexia.

comments: This app doesn't work even if you paid for the upgraded version. The app doesn't allow you to customize the spelling list. I get an error message " EZSTT DEMO". I wish I knew that info before I upgraded the app.

App deletes custom words and profiles when it closes. No parent has time to add the words everytime their kid closes the app. This is what databases and files are for. Requesting a refund. Would repurchase if this issue was addressed.
Doesn't save custom words, who has time to be entering this every time. Not much good.

I used it for the first time today.  I added my daughter's homework in the custom selection and it doesn't let you lable/ title your customer list.   Once we started it started glitching right away.   Please fix it or give me my money back.

This app would be great if it worked properly. 75% of the time, the keyboard on the custom list games doesn't work. I didn't see any others using this problem, so I'm not sure why mine is doing this. Unfortunately, I'm out the money on a broken game.

title: Math Tricks
description:
This program is designed for those who want to learn interesting mathematical tricks to speed up the calculating. These tricks will help solve part of the mathematical problems and tasks much faster than classical. Will also be helpful to those who want to hone basics such as the multiplication table. 

When you learn these mathematical tricks, you'll be able to show off your skills to friends and prove to them that you have a talent for mathematics. New skills you can use in the store, at school, at college, at work - wherever thanks to quick calculation skills can save a lot of precious time.

Fun Math Tricks:
1. Addition
2. Subtraction
3. Multiplication table
4. Division
5. Multiply two digit number by 11
6. Square numbers ending in 5
7. Multiply by 5
8. Multiply by 9
9. Multiply by 4
10. Dividing by 5
11. Subtracting from 1000   
12. Tough multiplication   
13. Power of two
14. Adding numbers close to hundreds
15. Subtracting numbers close to hundreds
16. Multiply numbers between 11 and 19
17. Square numbers between 11 and 99
18. Multiply two digit numbers having same tens digit and ones digits add up to ten
19. Square numbers between 50 and 59
20. Square numbers between 40 and 49
21. Multiply two digit numbers editing in 1
22. Percent
23. Square numbers between 100 and 109
...
84. n^9

Training mode: 
- 15 levels for every trick
- timer 15 seconds
Rating stars:
- score > 000 - ‚òÖ‚òÜ‚òÜ
- score > 350 - ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ 
- score > 650 - ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

This free version of Math Tricks contains third party advertisements.

The app uses the following APIs and libraries:
* MPAndroidChart - created by Philipp Jahoda
* ColorPIcker - created by Piotr Adamus

It's a mind blowing app. I'll recommend every one to install the app. It comprises of millions of tricks, which are really helpful. Thanks a lot to the app developer for developing this outstanding app.

title: TalkTablet PRO  Autism AAC, Aphasis, Parkinsons
description:
Award winning TalkTablet PRO is the only fully featured symbols-based AAC app that is available for iOS, Android and Windows tablets...with the ability to share buttons and pages between platforms.   It will also work certain Google Chromebooks.

This version is NOT compatible with Android watches or the SpeechWatch. 

QUESTIONS?  Speak to REAL people at 866-487-1006

To see a feature comparison chart of AAC/speech apps... visit www.TalkTablet.com

TalkTablet PRO¬Æ is a fully-featured AAC speech/communication solution for people who have difficulty communicating as a result of autism, aphasia, Down Syndrome, stroke, laryngectomy or any other condition that affects a persons ability to communicate effectively.  NOW with fully customizable PoP-Up pages!!

TalkTablet PRO is developed by Gus Communication Devices, a leader in speech software for over 25 years.  First released in 2012, TalkTablet has become the premier, reasonably priced, Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) solution for children and adults with autism, aphasia, Rett Syndrome, Down syndrome, developmental disabilities, apraxia, stroke, or traumatic brain injury.

Simplicity by Design
‚Ä¢ Speak by touching buttons that contain predefined words or phrases
‚Ä¢ Add random text to phrases using the embedded on-screen keyboard
* Includes over 30,000+ Symbolstix symbols, the most in the industry

Choose one of the included vocabularies and start communicating today!
‚Ä¢ TalkTablet PRO includes TWELVE (12) SLP designed starter vocabularies that offer 4 to 48 buttons/page.
   OR create a new vocabulary of your own design

Expand your pages along with the user's progression
‚Ä¢ Each grid size (buttons/page) can be increased or decreased at any time to suit your needs
‚Ä¢ Transition to literacy with word prediction

EASY, EASY customization
‚Ä¢ Add buttons, pages, or new vocabularies in a flash.  The most intuitive AAC app available today.

‚Ä¢ Choose from over 30,000 SymbolStix‚Ñ¢ symbols (worlds largest AAC library), or take photos with the camera, use photos from your album, or add Google images to your buttons

‚Ä¢ Create unlimited user vocabularies from a single app

‚Ä¢ Change color, font, borders, backgrounds and more on each button or page

‚Ä¢ Buttons can be made invisible, dimmed or normal

‚Ä¢ Move buttons by simply pressing, holding and dragging to new location

‚Ä¢ Copy and paste buttons between page or user vocabularies

‚Ä¢ Prevent unwanted editing by enabling a password to the editing area

‚Ä¢ Prevent unwanted repeated tapping of buttons with the ‚ÄúTap Delay‚Äù feature

‚Ä¢ Includes natural sounding voices (not robotic) in multiple languages..OR use the included audio recording function to record voices or sounds

* Share buttons, pages or entire vocabularies WIRELESSLY with other TalkTablet users.

‚Ä¢ Built-in backup and restore feature to safeguard your pages, including our free offsite backup service

‚Ä¢ Compatible with handheld and tablet devices running Android

‚Ä¢ An internet connection is NOT required to use TalkTablet.  It is a ‚Äústand alone‚Äù app

‚Ä¢ Includes toll free telephone technical support and free updates‚Ä¶.for LIFE

‚Ä¢ Created by the leader in speech software for over 25 years!!

********************************************************
TalkTablet includes our free TalkTablet Sharing Service which allows users to share buttons, pages of buttons or entire user vocabularies with other TalkTablet users anywhere in the world. Requires an internet connection.
******************************************************** 

Learn more about TalkTablet and view step-by-step video tutorials at www.TalkTablet.com

6938 E Quail Track Drive

recentChanges: Various updates, speed improvements and onscreen keyboard fix.
comments: This is an fantastic app to express forst and feeling

Wont open comes to a page saying not found then loops back to google play Update contacted Google for refund, Google said contact developer. Developer says contact google. Thanks for the run around on an expensive non working app.

Very supportive and responsive support. App has an easy to use UI for communication and seems to be quite customizable. The PIN function to restrict changes to settings is very useful. It does install all images locally but that also allows the app full functionality even when not connected to the internet. The app comes with multiple different page layouts on installation, and has the ability to create custom pages as well. However, I did have to explore myself the various settings and options available in the app, and how they changed the functionality and interface of the app. The degree of customization is great, such as custom buttons with personal images and sound recordings for true personalization of expression but these options can feel a little overwhelming for those that are unfamiliar with AAC apps or communication apps in general. Some sort of in app onboarding to help new users customize the app to their communication needs where new users can view the default page types/layouts easily when they first start the app, and a help/guide function or library explaining the different options available to users as far as customization and control goes would be very helpful. If there is a manual included in the application, it is not easily located. Otherwise, this app suits our needs perfectly, and I would definitely recommend this app.

Wonderful speech app and incredible customer service. We've been using Proloquo2go for years and with each new version it is increasingly difficult to use, NO customer support in the US, and is so ridiculously expensive. Our school recommended TalkTablet and we are so much happier now. It has been a breath of fresh air. So much easier and more intuitive to use. No comparison. And the fellow we called at TalkTablet with some questions, before and after purchasing was outstanding 5*

I am a community support worker who supports many people with speech difficulties of different types. This app is by far the best app in versatility, usability, and price. Customer support is the best that I've found, you accually get to talk to a real person if there are any questions which have been far and few in between do to the extreme user friendliness of this app. I can't say enough good things about the creater of this program, it has changed many people's lives. Thank You!

title: here - a puzzle game
description:
100+ puzzles. Each puzzle with its own design and logic. 
All you have to do is use your brain and make/find the word here in more than 100 minimal challenging puzzles.
Simple.

A clean looking minimal puzzle game that requires your brain to think something different and outside the box every time. 

Each level looks simple and clean, but the puzzles in them are unique and have a set of varying difficulties. The puzzles involve different challenges like logic, memory, physics, word plays, brainy, reflexes, speed, and much more. The difficulty increases with the level number and each level come with 3 hints. Got stuck? Take a hint, find your way out, and make here. 

The game is packed with smooth animations and 100+ unique puzzles. It's easy to understand and simple to play, but not so easy to solve. Your puzzle-solving skills will be tested and we'll even set a mood by playing eerie and puzzling music for you.

For all kinds of age groups who love to connect the dots and solve puzzles!

It's here, but can you find it?

Music by N a t o o s h 

https://soundcloud.com/natooshvpw 
https://sleeplessvpw.bandcamp.com

Privacy Policy: https://www.techyonicgames.com/here-privacy-policy

I've played the main portion of this game, and the puzzles reminded me a little bit of When the Darkness Comes on Steam. I loved it, simple concept with very creative levels, given the objective.

This game is probably one of the best puzzle games I've played in a while. I always find the time to go back and play this game again and again. It's not too challenging, but it makes you think, and that's what matters to me. Amazing game.
Very decent game that makes you scratch your head! Some puzzles are pretty tough! I recommend a try...

title: SpellTree
description:
EnAble India's mission is to empower persons with disability. As a non-profit organization, we train and counsel persons with disability and prepare them to join the mainstream workforce as confident individuals. 

Spelling is an integral part of the reading and writing process and one which poses unique challenges for students with visual impairment.

SpellTree is free and handy tool for all persons with visual impairment as well as physical impairment to improve their English. Using this, students can begin to develop dictionaries of the words that they misspell, and in this way they will be motivated to learn to spell words that are the most meaningful to them.

Application has been architected and developed by a team of Cisco Engineers comprising Archana DS , Piyush Lashkari , Sarath Babu R Hemachandran, Sagar Shukla and Bakul Mittal. The team was led by Savita Thakur and Product expert is Mohith BP from EnAble India.

title: EU-Schwerbehinderung - Home call & emergency app
description:
Primary features of the app:

- With our panic button (similar to a house emergency call), which works even when the cell phone is locked without tapping a text message, they alert someone via text message, without any Internet, if they need help. 

- Supports Flic Button to trigger a emergency call (https://bit.ly/2lUqg3s)

- Supports the V.ALRT emergency call button worn as a pendant or bracelet. The SMS emergency call can thus be triggered directly via the button. (Bluetooth 4 required)

- Alarm monitor: When receiving an emergency SMS from the app or via V.ALRT, a S.A.R. Card with the position of the person seeking help.

- Geosearch via SMS and thus also without mobile data network possible. 

- Sending and receiving encrypted SMS for communication with confidential data.

- Answering encrypted text messages with Smartwatch (Wearable), Notification, SMS Inbox, that sent from another device using this or the free app. Answer SMS is sent encrypted. 

Additional options (For people with disabilities or people in need of care, free of charge):

- If your device has corresponding sensors, an SMS can be sent as a motion alarm to a previously defined receiver. **

- Alerting when leaving a pre-defined geozone

- Trigger SMS alarm via smartwatch when leaving the geozone (home zone)

- Geotracking can record the personal routes that are stored locally on the device.

- Optionally there is the possibility to access our Tips & Tricks library.

More functions:
By registering partner devices (via QR code from the app) you can search for them. This feature is especially useful for those in need. But can also be an aid in your personal expeditions and is a supplement to the Panic Button. Registered partner devices can be searched for (can be deactivated, data is only stored in the app)

- encrypted SMS
- Panic Button for Emergency SMS
- Share current articles
- Latest articles available offline
- Dual SIM support
- Compatible with the Windows 10 app
- Wheelmap.org integration

Chargeable additional modules (free of charge for some groups):

This app allows you to access the web resources (blog, press portal, media portal) from our news page www.eu-schwerbehinderung.eu. We want to make it easier for all people with disabilities to access our news and information. Of course, people without disabilities are invited to make the information easier to access with this app.

Articles can be shared via "sharing" with apps that support it (eg mail, social networks).

If you save your articles as a favorite, you will also be able to access them permanently, and in addition to the normal offline function for daily articles, you will be able to read them or read them at any time.

- Retrieve our latest news
- News by category
- Tips & Tricks database
- Speech output (reading texts)
- Favorites Administration (read and read articles offline)
- Search for devices registered as partners (via QR code)
- Use as geo-tracker with route display for the "way back"
- Wearable support (Android or Citzen based smartwatch)
- Alarm monitor for "panic button" with SMS reception (can be deactivated)
- Search by SMS (encrypted and disconnectable)
- All alarm functions independent of the Internet
- Motion detection with alarm (can be deactivated)
- Motion detection individually configurable
- Panic button can be activated when the device is locked

Note: Please refer to our help text in the menu 'Info', the necessary battery settings, which are required for Android 8, for the app to work properly.

Further information:
https://www.eu-schwerbehinderung.eu/index.php/22-unsere-apps/108-unsere-apps

Note: Some features can be provided by the manufacturer, but are limited if the smartphone does not meet the requirements.

- Share current articles
- Latest articles available offline
- Dual SIM support
- Compatible with the Windows 10 app
- Wheelmap.org integration

Chargeable additional modules (free of charge for some groups):

This app allows you to access the web resources (blog, press portal, media portal) from our news page www.eu-schwerbehinderung.eu. We want to make it easier for all people with disabilities to access our news and information. Of course, people without disabilities are invited to make the information easier to access with this app.

Articles can be shared via "sharing" with apps that support it (eg mail, social networks).

If you save your articles as a favorite, you will also be able to access them permanently, and in addition to the normal offline function for daily articles, you will be able to read them or read them at any time.

- Retrieve our latest news
- News by category
- Tips & Tricks database
- Speech output (reading texts)
- Favorites Administration (read and read articles offline)
- Search for devices registered as partners (via QR code)
- Use as geo-tracker with route display for the "way back"
- Wearable support (Android or Citzen based smartwatch)
- Alarm monitor for "panic button" with SMS reception (can be deactivated)
- Search by SMS (encrypted and disconnectable)
- All alarm functions independent of the Internet
- Motion detection with alarm (can be deactivated)
- Motion detection individually configurable
- Panic button can be activated when the device is locked

Note: Please refer to our help text in the menu 'Info', the necessary battery settings, which are required for Android 8, for the app to work properly.

Further information:
https://www.eu-schwerbehinderung.eu/index.php/22-unsere-apps/108-unsere-apps

Note: Some features can be provided by the manufacturer, but are limited if the smartphone does not meet the requirements.

title: Asperger Syndrome: Causes,Diagnosis,and Management
description:
Asperger syndrome (AS), also known as Asperger's, is a developmental disorder characterized by significant difficulties in social interaction and nonverbal communication, along with restricted and repetitive patterns of behavior and interests.[3] As a milder autism spectrum disorder (ASD), it differs from other ASDs by relatively normal language and intelligence. Although not required for diagnosis, physical clumsiness and unusual use of language are common. Signs usually begin before two years old and typically last for a person's entire life. 
The exact cause of Asperger's is unknown. While it is probably partly inherited, the underlying genetics have not been determined conclusively. Environmental factors are also believed to play a role. Brain imaging has not identified a common underlying problem. The diagnosis of Asperger's was removed in the 2013 fifth edition of the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (DSM-5), and people with these symptoms are now included within the autism spectrum disorder along with autism and pervasive developmental disorder not otherwise specified (PDD-NOS). It remains within the tenth edition of the International Classification of Diseases (ICD-10) as of 2015. 
==========================
APP FEATURES
==========================
This exclusive app will help to understand the Asperger Syndrome symptoms, Asperger Syndrome management, Asperger Syndrome causes, Asperger Syndrome diagnosis, Asperger Syndrome Prognosis, Asperger Syndrome Epidemiology and history. 
Here are features that make this app better than all other Asperger Syndrome apps - 
-	UI of app is very user responsive and easy to navigate. 
-	Easily Change the page.
-	Data of app is collected from various research reports.
-	You can access these favorites whenever you want.
-	Share your favorite benefits with your friends and family through email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, and WhatsApp.

All these features are available for free. 

==========================
SAY HELLO
==========================
Any medical information published on this app is not intended as a substitute for informed medical advice and you should not take any action before consulting with a healthcare professional. Our team are nonstop working hard on creation this app. Please feel free to review and email us for any questions/suggestions/complications. If you have liked any feature and information of this app, please do not forget to rate us on play store. This app does not accept any responsibility for any loss, which may arise from reliance on ads & information contained on this app.

comments: Can't log into my account anymore. I've played for 6 years with no problems, now in the last 3 weeks I've had more issues than I can count trying to log in. I've rebooted my phone, I've cleared my cache, I've turned off my VPN, I've cleared my junk files and my residual files with Norton Clean, and I've deleted the game and reloaded it, NOTHING WORKS.

At first it was okay, $4.99 packs then $19.99 packs to help you advance, now mostly everything is $100 packs. I also notice that they were giving more hero energy and loyalty points to help you out in the game now you barly get loyalty points and you hardly ever get hero energy. They don't sell shields so you have to buy them with loyalty points but how can you buy them with loyalty points if you hardly win enough to buy the shield so you constantly get attacked and have your hero taken. üëé

Have played this game for a number of years getting very discouraged game will load for a day then close spontaneously during the loading process. They tell me its my phone but when others have the same issue. I'm seeing they only want money not fix the issues I'm down grading my stars to a 2 because of technical issues without fixes and it has evolved to a pay to play, pay to win game.

Use to be a Good game but you can't advance without buying a pack now. The developer has to lower those prices not everyone can afford $99.00 a pop for a Pack especially nowadays Put up some $5 or $10 deals like other game do so the rest of us can advance too... Its a google play game guys Stop being greedy for money listen to the reviews players not happy with the game anymore.

I played this game all the time on my samsung phones. Very fun game to keep up with. Now I'm on my oneplus 7 pro and nothing loads other than the all text boxes and buildings. I can't transfer my account because I don't know what I'm pressing. This is one of few games I have spent money on, I'd like to not lose that account.

title: Dcoder, Compiler IDE :Code & Programming on mobile
description:
Dcoder is a mobile coding IDE and platform (Compiler for mobile), where you can run your projects, code and learn algorithms by programming on mobile. Build and deploy your projects straight from the mobile and integrate with Git (Gtihub, bitbucker) and sync with vs code, use of code compilations to make coding easy. Now code anytime, anywhere and on the go.


Choose from frameworks like:
1. React js
2. Angular js
3. Django
4. Flask
5. Flutter
6. Git support (Github or bitbucket)
7. Ruby on rails

.. and many many more...

Or choose from languages like:

1. C : learn C programming, a powerful general-purpose language.
2. C++ : GCC compiler 6.3
3. Java :  best Java Programming ide, JDK 8
4. Python : learn Python 2.7 and Python 3.
5. C# : Mono Compiler 4
6. Php : Php Interpreter 7.0
7. Objective-C : GCC compiler
8. Ruby : Ruby version 1.9
9. Lua : Lua Interpreter 5.2
10. JS/NodeJS : Node.js engine 6.5
11. Go : Go Lang 1.6
12. VB.Net 
13. F# 
14. Common Lisp 
15. R 
16. Scala 
17. Perl 
18. Pascal 
19. Swift 
20. Tcl 
21, Prolog 
22. Assembly 
23. Haskell 
24. Clojure 
25. Kotlin 
26. Groovy 
27. Scheme 
28. Rust
29. Bf
30. Html
31. Css

Dcoder uses a Rich Text Editor supporting syntax highlighting and packed with the necessary tools to offer you all the edge that an IDE or code compiler is supposed to.

Its the fastest code compiler (IDE), coding and programming app available for android so far.

With Dcoder one can:

Write a program/code in any of the available 50+ Programming Languages and frameworks.
Code and Debug the code, see compilation results and errors at the same time on the same screen. 
Enjoy the power and ease of coding on your favourite Code Editor like Notepad++ or Sublime Text with compilation power, makes it equivalent to a powerful IDE like eclipse.
Test your problem solving skills by solving challenges from the number of algorithm based challenges available in Challenges section. 
Learn Html, Css, JavaScript, Ruby programming, C Programming, Python and Java in the app along with many more programming languages.
Irrespective of your coding skills be it beginner or expert Dcoder helps you to learn code and improve your skills while in a boring lecture or whenever you feel like.

The main features include:

1.	Rich Text Editor with Syntax highlighting.(Code Editor) 
2.	Line number, Auto indent, Autocomplete Parenthesis.
3.	Undo Redo.
4.	File Open/Save.
5.	Custom Suggestion View.
6.	Multiple Language Support.
7.	User input for languages like C, C++, Java, Php, JavaScript, Node.js and others.
8.	Active debug view for faster access to Output.
9.	Thoroughly designed Algorithm problems to improve coding Skills and make programmers industry ready.
10.	Leader Board: To know where you stand amongst the vast Dcoder community.
11.	Custom Menu Drawer, Custom Code Editor Themes, Editable font Size for Editor and much more!!



Disclaimer:  Dcoder uses an array of strong cloud based compilers to compile the code and display output, it is the fastest one and has helped to bring app size to ~8 MB, Please don't rate low or demand offline features that is not possible here. Also instead of rating low, you can write your problems to us at support@dcoder.tech that will let us help you better.

Dcoder is an online compiler, now run, compile and execute your code snippets on your own android mobile devices. 
 

Begin the journey to enhance your skills.

How to solve algorithms?
https://youtu.be/rwzdKkgWKV4


For a brief video:
https://youtu.be/X9lsvumpFGI


Join the Social Groups
For any help, questions related to Dcoder reach out on

https://www.linkedin.com/company/dcodermobile/

https://www.facebook.com/groups/dcodermobile

https://www.instagram.com/dcodermobile/

https://twitter.com/dcodermobile

Loved it? Be a beta tester, for early access to experimental features

https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.paprbit.dcoder

Privacy policy: https://dcoder.tech/privacy.html

Terms of use: https://dcoder.tech/termsofuse.html

title: Saving Your Relationship
description:
Even the happiest relationships go through troubled periods. Life is so full of change
and uncertainties and these can certainly put relationships to the test.

This guide aims to help people who are facing difficulties within their relationship
and need help with how to get things back on track. You may be considering if you
even want to stay in the relationship at all. This Saving Your Relationship app will help you consider your options and think everything through before walking away. Some of the ideas and techniques may even help you with other relationships in your life that you may have difficulties with ‚Äì perhaps with a friend, parent, sibling or other relative.

Included in this awesome Saving Your Relationship app is: 
* How to save your relationship
* Unrealistic Expectations 
* Putting the past to rest
* What you need to do next
* Communication
* Invest time and effort
* When it's time to let go
* and much much more...

If you are having trouble in your relationship with your friends, family or loved ones, now is the time to download this app and start learning ways on how to improve your relationship with those people. 

Download your free Saving Your Relationship app today and start improving the relationships in your life.

comments: I would give 4 or even 5 üåü, but the app is constantly rebooting. I have forced sync multiple times to remedy the problem none the less it will not stay on any chapter üò° just restarts & goes to the main screen!
I just started reading this app and it keeps glitching out. I try to read a chapter and it bounces back to the contents page and I have to start over again.

Did not bother to view it. As soon as it completed the install on my phone it popped up a WARNING message I have never seen before on any phone owned. Said something about a labeled type program was potential for harm on device then gave options of "whitelist" on the bottom left and the right "cancel" or "ok" & "uninstall". Maybe mention of program "dump." I clicked uninstall. Shame looked promising.

This app has compiled advice that is easy to follow without fail. (As long as you don't believe everything will work out positively in your favor by following it step-by-step. These are guidelines. Keys to help you open the locked door of the proverbial, "Forbidden and Taboo Box of Pandora", that is your relationship problems. Bottom Line: -When you want to make it work but don't know where to start or who to turn to,... This app is a very good start.

Great, inspiring and wise words of suggestion. I really wish there were more to each chapter. it's all common sense, at least to me, but beautifully written and easy to understand. love the overall message and neutrality.

title: Kill Shot Bravo: Free 3D FPS Shooting Sniper Game
description:
Welcome to Kill Shot Bravo! Free online FPS sniper shooting game on mobile! 
Go to war online and prove your sniper shooting skills in the king of multiplayer 3D sniper games.

Arm yourself with deadly sniper weapons, machine guns and the latest military gear to complete covert missions! All of this in a free online FPS multiplayer action shooting game. In Kill Shot Bravo, it‚Äôs your duty to save the world. That means hunting terrorists, killing zombies and waging war on evil armies. 

Call yourself a sharp shooter with pixel precision? Then put your skills to the test in the top free online multiplayer sniper game on mobile.  

*OVER 2400 MISSIONS*
As a Special Forces soldier your duty will be to navigate secret missions across the globe, shooting hostile army forces that stand in the way of a peaceful world.
If you love FPS sniper 3D killing games you'll love this.
‚Ä¢ From guerrilla combat in jungle mountain ranges, to recon missions on Mediterranean islands, to modern warfare in city streets you‚Äôll travel the world to gun down terror threats as an elite sniper. 
‚Ä¢ Commandeer vehicles to turn the tide of battle! Navigate close quarter combat down narrow alleys in the back of a jeep, or take out hostile threats by air in hazardous helicopter missions! 
‚Ä¢ Complete breach missions to enter occupied buildings and clear them of any threat! Survive a full on enemy attack in multiplayer assault games and shoot more enemies than your opponent. 
‚Ä¢ Move through stunning 3D environments to find the best sniper vantage points and take the all-important Kill Shot! 

Download the app now for free and enjoy regular updates with new regions and missions. This is one fps game you won‚Äôt get bored of. 

*GO TO WAR WITH THE ENEMY*
‚Ä¢ Shoot different enemy types each with their own strengths and combat objectives. Prove you can adapt to different shooting game styles. 
‚Ä¢ Unleash your fury and shoot down Flying Drones, Exo-Suit Soldiers, Zombies, Mechs, Heavy Gunners, sniper assassin Enemy RPGs, Marksmen, Riflemen, Commando Bombers and finally kill the boss.

*LIVE PVP SNIPER DUELS*
‚Ä¢ Clash against snipers in live online multiplayer Player Verses Player shooting matches in PVP mode!  
‚Ä¢ Be the hunter before you are the hunted!
‚Ä¢ Use your heat meter to zone in on the enemy threat. 
‚Ä¢ Find your target. Take aim. Shoot!
‚Ä¢ Online Multiplayer shooting games have never felt this real.

*JOIN ALLIANCES AND BOUNTY EVENTS*
‚Ä¢ This time you won't be fighting alone! Build powerful alliances with other shooters and help each other to complete the high-risk missions. 
‚Ä¢ Hunt and collect bounties from enemies.
‚Ä¢ Take out hordes of zombies in exclusive events. Work with your alliance to stop the Virus and start killing some zombies. New Zombie Shooter Game modes!
‚Ä¢ Friends can join you in multiplayer missions, spotting the targets and assisting you to shoot enemies.
‚Ä¢ Full Chat function in game to allow tactical discussions with other snipers.

*CUSTOMIZE*
‚Ä¢ Customize your avatar and get Perks to help in the battle! 
‚Ä¢ Unlock and equip cool army gear, including helmets, military uniforms, body armor, goggles, facemasks, gloves, boots, and more.
‚Ä¢ Get a fresh Kill Shot moment with every victory! Now YOU get to control the Kill Shot. This is a free online multiplayer fps sniper game with premium customized content. 

* GOOGLE PLAY SERVICES LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS*
‚Ä¢ Compete for high scores alone or with your Alliance against opposing Alliances.
‚Ä¢ Earn Achievements for showing off your deadly sniper skills.
‚Ä¢ Take on weekly Quests to win additional prizes and achievements

OTHER FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Free online multiplayer games and offline single player experience
‚Ä¢ 3D Guns, tons of sniper weapons

Play the Best Fun free FPS Sniper 3D Shooting Game on Mobile for Free!

¬©2020 Hothead Games Inc., Hothead, and Kill Shot are trademarks or registered trademarks of Hothead Games Inc., all rights reserved.

comments: SUPPORT experience is horrible. The response is always like "we are not able to process this", "unfortunately we cannot help on this", "we have reviewed your case but unable to offer anything further" etc. It's very difficult to Earn Golds and majority of items in game (about 80%) requires Gold to buy while the other 2 currencies (Cash and Medals) are hardly in need but are offered plenty through various Events. Overall you have to put in lots of money and time into this game for nothing.

This is very good game. If you want to top in this game you must have gold and bucks. You have to collect gold by tapjoy and also need some purchase. This game grafics are good. And control is also good. Gun upgrading is necessary. When you purchase a weapon you have to upgrade full. This is a good game.üëçüëçüëç

I played the game for 2 years and spent a lot of money in it, literally you have to buy everyhting from here even energy to play when it should be free, each target is 2 or 3 energies and it cost money too if you go to alliance war you have to shoot almost 22 hours straight non stop to get in a good place and you get rewards rhat after 3 or 4 weeks you dont anymore and you have to keep buying guns to level up. I only give this game 1 star rate because all of the money you have to spend

Lots of micro transactions to go with all the ads. You need to upgrade your weapon almost every mission and they get a delay before going into effect. I saw 40 minutes with a rank 2 weapon, can't imagine what it would be with higher ranked weapons. Unless of course you use more micro transactions to skip the time. Seems like you spend more time waiting than playing

Wow. My old phone is logged in using my Facebook and my Google account. I got a new phone and my new phone won't allow me to sign into my existing account even when I sign in with the same Google and Facebook account. I am not starting over on this game. Very frustrating your system won't allow me to get my account back between phones!

title: Baldi's Basics Math Education and Learning
description:
Welcome to  Baldi Back to School Basics Math Education and Learning is a quick indie horror recreation, fully 3D interactive, fun-time educational game that teaches a slew of topics in baldi's of Basics for Education the difficulties and Learning are super and lovely .

Baldi Back to School Basics Math Education and Learning The player must strategize to use their items wisely and pay attention to their surroundings to avoid being hindered by the strange cast of characters Baldi Back to School Basics Math Education and Learning!
Baldi's Basics roblox's is a meta horror game that's really weird, with no real educational value to be found.
You'll need to learn all the ins-and-outs of the game to come up with a winning strategy and avoid being caught by Baldi. Learning how to use Baldi's friends to your advantage, wisely managing the items found throughout the school, and memorizing the layout of Baldi's school are all keys to success! 
Watch out from baldi super duper ultra fast and all of his wierdo friends, because you need to find 8 notebooks before you can escape from scary laboratory school education with mysterious ending you can find. Gotta sweep, playtime, principal and other character including teaches school will try to slow you down, not because they likes you.. no teaches never ever helps you because Learning is a mania maniac math teacher super duper ultra fast mod edition. When you collect a notebook, you need to answer mathematics questions faster, otherwise if you answered it wrong, baldi does't like stupid students and super school duper ultra fast will punish them because wrong is wrong and need to be improved faster. Dont ever make horror baldi's angry and mad.

Game Features:

- Game Graphic 3d.
- Original voice acting.
- Find a way out of school.
- Original craft environment basics baldi.
- The atmosphere of horror.
- Camping Field Trip at education learning math school.
- Addition games: Adding numbers with Quiz and Practice games.
- Subtraction games: Subtracting numbers to solve the equations education learning school.
- Multiplication games: Multiplication tables learning and duel play mode
- Division games: Practice and learn Division tables
- Exponential and square root: counting math puzzles for kids and adults
- Multiply number game
- Cool Maths puzzle games education learning school.
- Maths Times Tables.
- Math classic 15 Puzzle, Sudoku and more math exercises for brain.
- NEW Online Multiplayer math game.
- All in one Math app with mini Maths game & math puzzles.
- Solve problems in the laptop.
- You will experience a real horror.
- Simple controls make it easy to solve puzzles.
- Rotation mode for greater challenge! move pieces in groups.
- Each movement of Angry Teacher is accompanied by a strike with a ruler.
- Best fun Maths play game with dark mode.

Find items and use them wisely to better your chances of winning.

Download Baldi Back to School Basics Math Education and Learning now and appreciate this horor game. Much obliged to you!

title: Chime - Mobile Banking
description:
Welcome to banking made awesome. 

Chime is mobile and online banking with no hidden fees: get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit, have fee-free overdraft when you‚Äôre in a pinch, grow your savings automatically, and manage your finances like a boss using the highly-rated Chime mobile banking app.

When you bank with Chime, you get a Visa¬Æ Debit Card, a Spending Account, and an optional Savings Account to help you save money. 

Applying for an account is free, takes less than 2 minutes and it won‚Äôt affect your credit score!

Here‚Äôs what our members love most about Chime:
‚Ä¢ Get your paycheck up to 2 days early* with direct deposit
‚Ä¢ Fee-free overdraft.** We‚Äôll spot you on debit card purchases with no overdraft fees. 
‚Ä¢ No hidden fees: no monthly fees, no overdraft fees, no foreign transaction fees, no minimum balance requirements 
‚Ä¢ Over 38,000 fee-free ATMs with Moneypass and Visa Plus Alliance
‚Ä¢ Real-time transaction notifications
‚Ä¢ Daily balance alerts
‚Ä¢ Block your card instantly in-app
‚Ä¢ Grow your savings automatically with our Savings Account
‚Ä¢ Send money instantly with Pay Friends to other Chime members. 
‚Ä¢ Deposit checks using Mobile Check Deposit for eligible members.^ 
‚Ä¢ Apple Pay‚Ñ¢ / Google Pay‚Ñ¢ for when you forget your wallet
‚Ä¢ Move money between your other bank accounts
‚Ä¢ EMV chip card security
‚Ä¢ Friendly and responsive customer support

With the Chime mobile banking app, you can stay in control of your money. Track your spending, link your other bank accounts, and save money.

How to switch banks:
‚Ä¢ Step 1: Open Your Account: Download the app and sign up. Once approved, we‚Äôll send you your Chime card within two weeks!
‚Ä¢ Step 2: Fund Your Account: Set up a direct deposit with your employer or payer to have funds deposited to your Chime account every payday. You can also connect other bank accounts and transfer funds from your existing bank account.
‚Ä¢ Step 3: Update Bill Payments: Activate your card when it arrives, add it to Apple Pay, and set up recurring bill payments with your Chime card number or with your Chime Spending Account and routing numbers.

‚Ä®For more information please visit www.chime.com.

***Learn how we collect and use your information by visiting our Privacy Policy at https://www.chimebank.com/policies/chime/privacy-policy/.***

Banking services provided by, and debit card issued by, The Bancorp Bank, or Stride Bank, N.A., Members FDIC, pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Debit card may be used everywhere Visa debit cards are accepted.

*Early access to direct deposit funds depends on the timing of payer‚Äôs submission of deposits. We generally post such deposits on the day they are received which may be up to 2 days earlier than the payer‚Äôs scheduled payment date.
**Chime SpotMe is an optional, no fee service that requires that you receive $500 in direct deposit a month to qualify to overdraw your account up to $20 on debit card purchases. Chime, in its sole discretion, may allow you to withdraw your account up to $100 or more based on your Chime Account history, direct deposit history and amount, spending activity and other risk-based factors. Your Limit will be displayed to you within the Chime mobile app. You will receive notice of any changes to your Limit. Your Limit may be increased or lowered at any time by Chime.
^Not all new or existing customers are eligible to use Mobile Deposit. There are qualifications and enrollment requirements for participation in Mobile Deposit, and we reserve the right to change the qualification and enrollment requirements in our sole discretion at any time without prior notice. We may require you to upload a picture of your driver‚Äôs license or other identifying documents prior to using Mobile Deposit. Eligibility requirements can be found online after you have signed into your Spending Account.

recentChanges: Happy Halloween! If you're not out trick or treating, you can have fun reading up on our latest release notes. Instead of leaving you with some tricks, we're leaving a few treats in the form of bug fixes.
comments: amazing bank. love the instant notifications and easy direct deposits. very simple to use. Update: 10/20 Go with a real bank. This bank enjoys doing random maintenance on all accounts. Completely disabling your account for DAYS at a time. So far my account has been disabled for 2 days. There's plenty of money in my account, I just can't use any of it. Dropped to 3 stars simply because it's a free bank account. That's the only good thing about Chime. Its free. They just control your money.

My experience with Chime overall has been a great one. Instead of getting paid on Fridays, I get paid on Wednesdays every week via direct deposit. Two days early! Chime also offers the SpotMe feature, which is basically overdraft protection with no fees. Another cool feature for this being a virtual bank, is you have the option to set up a Secured Credit Builder Card with no pre-set credit limit, up to $10,000. I'm on the waitlist right now, but from what I read, it sounds very helpful!

More honest review today, today marks the third time in two months that time bank has frozen, has had technical difficulties and has no one available to up to talk to customers for hours on end. Now yes time is convenient, but there are other cards like it on the market. Which I am now starting to look into, as well as brick and mortar building type banks because unfortunately I can't let this keep happening especially not during the holiday season.

I have had this mobile banking app for over 6 years and haven't had any problems but recently their have been outages causing the app to be unavailable and my money unusable! I'm extremely furious that they can't keep their app working properly so I can use MY MONEY! Currently waiting for the app to be available so I can take my money and go to another bank! This is outrageous and you get no compensation for the late payments or overall difficulty of not being able to use YOUR MONEY!

I would be rating this higher, but for some reason I am not being shown a history of my purchases on the app. My girlfriend doesn't seem to be having this issue, only me. I have double checked to ensure that I have the most recent update, which I do. I cannot determine the cause for this. Any advice or assistance would be appreciated. The 'support bot' has not been any help at all. Thanks.

comments: Great game...BUT! Had issues with this game a year ago, but thought I'd give it another go. Graphics and game play are excellent, however I bought credits (AU$70), bet big, won free games (Where's The Gold) then the game froze. Restarted it, recovered the game then froze again. Restarted it, same thing. Third time it just took the free games. No reply from support. You bet big with the hope of winning free games, then it takes away your prize.

This app has the best graphics....but thats it. I've tried buying credits etc to 'pay my way' for better payouts, but all Product Madness are concerned about is making you pay more for something worthless. There is no way you can win any money back, its supposed to be for fun, but you have to pay big ongoing premiums to have any 'fun'. Until l see a better return on the money I've paid so far, they'll not get another penny out of me. You are better off saving your money for real gambling.

I keep wanting to give this game more stars, but they just wont let me. Yes I'm very happy that you put way better values on the daily wheel. Yes I play this game because the games are ones I've played in real casinos...i can't give more than one star because you just make it impossible to win anything...when you go through 5 million coins betting minimum and never get a bonus or win anything higher than double your bet you just want to give up. Plus, the cost of buying coins is ridiculous.

I think its great , you know it costs them money to put these games on here, so to anyone that's not happy just remember these games are free, and entertaining , And it takes our minds off of today's problems, Tomas blanco

Total scam. Fixed games and they expect you to pay for credits? Games don't pay, stupid and totally unnecessary side games (open boxes for items or scratch fixed lottery tickets). The only good thing about this app is that the games look like the real deal but the overall experience is terrible.

title: Free Online Tarot Reading - Free Psychic Question
description:
Download Free Online Tarot Reading and get profound answers for any psychic question! 

‚ò• Choose a tarot reader ‚ò• 
‚ò• Start at $1/min and get first 3 minutes FREE ‚ò•
‚ò• Find the key to inner peace ‚ò•

Why choose us?

‚ò• You get 3 FREE three minutes of chat with every new Pro tarot card reader you ask ‚Äì our top priority is you.

‚ò• Our huge variety of cherry-picked online tarot experts, experienced in guiding people through tough times.

‚ò• Choose between chatting or using a voice call to get your tarot reading online.

‚ò• Our tarot readers and psychics can assist you on any of life‚Äôs issues, be it romantic difficulties, career paths or self-doubts in any field.

Download the Free Online Tarot Reading app now, and within seconds you shall receive the guidance you deserve!

Different tarot spreads answer different questions

What is a tarot spread? 
Tarot readings depend on the type of Tarot spread used. There are various Tarot spreads that can be utilized, each focused on answering a different topic, and each free online tarot reading subject has different tarot spreads to answer specific questions.

The spread is selected according to the date and time, querent (you‚Äôll often hear a tarot reader refer to a querent - the person who is requesting the Tarot reading) and free psychic question the querent ask during the free online Tarot reading.

Ask your online Tarot cards reader to determine which spread is the most appropriate for your situation; for example, one of the most common Tarot spreads is the 3 card spread, used commonly for love Tarot readings. 

Various spreads
As aforementioned, there are numerous types of Tarot spreads, each one designed to answer a specific set of questions and meant for different online Tarot reading subjects. Some Tarot spreads can contain a single card designed to answer a yes or no question, while other questions can demand a more elaborate spread, which can include up to 14 Tarot cards. If you have any questions regarding the Tarot spread used in your tarot readings, make sure to relay the question to your tarot cards reader.

Building a rapport with your Tarot reader

V Since it‚Äôs risk-free, you can test several tarot cards readers before deciding which Tarot reader you feel most comfortable with giving you tarot spreads and free online tarot reading. Minutes after you download the Free Tarot Reading app, your trusted online Tarot reading will begin.

In the beginning, you may find it similar to a psychic reading or a horoscope. If you come across a tarot cards reader you love, they can become your life reader and cater to all your online tarot reading needs. 

Tested, powerful experts 

We work hard to make sure that the all-knowing Tarot readers in our app are professional, experienced readers. Some of the Tarot readers in the app can also be active and found on other sites or services, and each one of the Tarot readers on our app has customer ratings and customer reviews on their profile. That way you can be extremely comfortable when you select a psychic Tarot reader to provide for any free psychic question, knowing that the expert you talk to is a real one.

Download the Free Online Tarot Reading app and begin your free online Tarot reading with a 3 minute free trial (Tarot Gratis)!

comments: The coronavirus feels like some greater force shouting at us to wake up already and see what we're doing to the world. The fear and devastation made me decide to explore some spiritual options regarding this crisis, to see what we can do differently and make the world a better place. I really recommend this app for your spiritual journey - it brought me so much happiness and success.
in this age of screens, it's great to at least be able to make a human connection.

After getting my heart broken so many times, I thought no one could help me since I'm such a hopeless mess‚Ä¶ But I still believed that a tarot reading could change my fate. Who knew that I'd meet the love of my life after the cards showed me where I should go? I know it's hard to believe but that's what life is about, apparently: putting your faith in the cards and taking a leap to find true love.

WOW - SIMPLY WOW. My heart is soaring with the knowledge that my choices are actually right! I've been blessed with the opportunity to see clearly for once and im so lucky, because I finally have faith in the things I do every day - what an awesome experience
Great spreads and readers! 5 STARS

comments: I like that I can set the number of quote notifications to receive daily and the backgrounds are nice. Previously I had a problem with getting too many Bible quotes in one of the general themes. title: IQ Test - Free For All
description:
What is the IQ test?
IQ test which is also known as the ‚ÄòIntelligence Quotient‚Äô test, comes in various forms. It was first used in France to diagnose students with learning disabilities so they receive what nowadays is called special education. At the present time, an IQ test is not only used to identify those with mental disabilities but also to identify those who are intellectually gifted.

How is my IQ Test score calculated? 
An IQ Test score is calculated based on a norm group with an average score of 100 and a standard deviation of 15. The standard deviation of 15 means, 68% of individuals have scored between 85 and 115 on the IQ test. This means the average score will always be 100 and 95% of individuals will score between 70 and 130.

Why take an IQ test?
The purpose of taking an IQ test is to measure intelligence, to measure one‚Äôs reasoning and problem-solving abilities; and to analyze one‚Äôs mathematical understanding, language abilities as well as short term memory and information processing speed.

title: Free Tarot Card Reading
description:
Free Tarot Card Reading app offers you an exceptional fortune telling experience. Using the Rider Waite Tarot, you can see your future based on the cards you have drawn.

This experience is based on research conducted in the nineteenth century by the French magus, Edmond, and is the most advanced research that has been carried out nowadays from Edmond's manuscripts.
 
Find Below in Free Tarot Card Reading App:

‚ùâ Latin Tarot Reading: 

‚ùâ Love Tarot Reading: The love tarot is a specific tarot that is derived from the tarot, which aims to explore all forms of romantic issues. Whether you are single or in a relationship, you must concentrate hard on a specific question that relates to your love life.

‚ùâ Yes or No" Tarot Reading: Before reading the ‚Äúyes or no‚Äù tarot cards, you must think about a specific question. A ‚Äúyes or no‚Äù reading invites you to draw six cards. Then we will consider the favorable aspects that could result in a positive answer, and, on the other hand, the obstacles that you may have to overcome in future.

‚ùâ Celtic Cross Tarot Reading: Since its creation by Madame Indira in 1980, the Celtic Tarot has transported us into a universe designed for self-reflection and self-discovery. The cards draw on powerful symbolism, harmonious colors, and a cultural heritage that transports us through 2,500 years of history.

‚ùâ Angel Tarot Reading: The Angel Tarot will allow you to reconnect with your life project and get closer to what is essential for you. By using the symbolism of guardian angels, it helps you overcome the difficulties you are facing today.

‚ùâ Oracle Cards: Cards from the Oracle Tarot allow you to reveal the future in the most stunning way! They carry a message of hope and should enable you to ease your anxieties and overcome any doubt that you feel in your daily life. The Oracle Tarot should lead you into the universe of Mage Edmond, with a symbolism embodied in the 53 cards that should help you to understand your path through life.


Download the Free Tarot Card Reading app to get unique fortune telling experience.
