title: GG Relationship Doubt & Obsessions (ROCD)
description:
Created by Dr. Guy Doron (IDC), clinical psychologist and researcher
Feel like you're missing out on the perfect relationship? Finding it hard to commit? Experiencing constant doubts? Suffering from obsessive thinking? Want to expand your mind and make it more adaptive? GGRO is here to help!

RELIEVING OBSESSIVE THINKING IS POSSIBLE
Throw away negative thoughts. Approach positive ones. Learn to identify your inner self talk and respond quickly. Train daily and improve your wellness.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG apps.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, mood, obsessive, ROCD and maladaptive thinking. 

HOW DO I MANAGE MY ROCD?
The foundations of a healthy mind are built upon flexible beliefs. Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. For example, if I believe that ‚Äúmy partner has to be perfect‚Äù or ‚ÄúI have to be 100% certain about my partner‚Äú - I won't be able to live up to these expectations and my ability to deal with relationships will decrease.

BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self talk, it can change our beliefs and help us get rid of the ones that negatively affect our well being.

HOW GG APPS WORK
The application is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of negative and obsessive thoughts.
2. Train you to identify and challenge negative thoughts.
3. Increase your access to neutral, adaptive and positive thoughts.
4. Increase the accessibility of the above processes.
5. Provide daily mood and self esteem boost.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by CBT therapists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining healthy thinking during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and relationship OCD.

TRAIN YOUR THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes positive or neutral thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.
The longer we train making it a habit, the more automatic this process becomes.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
To feel better and improve your mind‚Äôs flexibility, start today! We believe apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG Apps are designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND TOPICS
The app's many topics and themes are broken down into more than 40 levels. Each level has a pool of self talk statements (or thoughts). Users are required to complete a random set of 'blocks' to complete the level.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, positive boost, comparing, perfectionism, embarrassment, uncertainty, commitment anxiety, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, distrust, fear of abandonment, and more.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle of obsessive thinking.

WHAT IF I COMPLETED ALL THE LEVELS?
The key to using the app is learning new topics, but even more importantly - training daily. There are levels designed as "daily training" for you to play once you completed your base course.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE FACTS BEHIND GG APPS
Visit our website: http://ggapps.net

OTHER APPS BY GG
GG OCD Training App
GG Body Image Distress & Preoccupation
GG Confidence & Self esteem
Good Blocks

developerAddress: 11 Dov Hoz Street, Tel Aviv, Israel
recentChanges: This release fixes a notification bug so you can now receive daily training reminders and tips.
comments: To each their own, and I can only speak for me here. However, I love this app. I find it stimulations in areas, for me, that I haven't experienced yet or at least helps me to identify problem areas in which to manage them. I love that it is available. It makes me feel content in knowing that regardless of how I feel.. there's still some positive type of response for me to read or engage and thayd helpful.

I guess it's an ok app/game. Pretty boring. All you do is swipe positive affirmations one way and negative ones the other way. There is no "training" or anything, no advice or tips or anything like that.

I was initially embarrassed to try this app and asked myself why anyone would admit to needing this kind of thing by giving a review. But oh my goodness!! This app is wonderful. It conditions the mind to think positively and embrace resilience and that is a beautiful thing. My husband is trying it now, too, and likes it as well. It has helped me already to have a more positive outlook and improved the way I relate to others. I wouldn't have believed it without trying it. So grateful!!
I've definitely seen improvement in managing my thoughts and it's really nice to see an app specifically for rocd. I'm docking a star simply because a $20 pay wall is extreme.

I was unsure at first because some of the exercises *could* (potentially, in certain situations) make things more difficult, if the relationship is abusive, for instance. *HOWEVER*, assuming that the person using the app does not have an abusive partner and is aware of their own weaknesses, I have found this app to be helpful. It definitely helps with intrusive, obsessive thoughts that sometimes creep into my head for no reason. And it helps me keep my crazy under wraps, lol

title: With the Qur'an (ŸÖÿπ ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±ÿ¢ŸÜ) - Memorization Tool
description:
Designed by Hifz experts and renowned Qur'an educators.

Unique Features of With the Qur‚Äôan App

From Huffaz, to Huffaz: ‚ÄòWith the Qur‚Äôan‚Äô app was conceived by people who themselves went through the process of hifz. This app contains features that are outcomes of practical experience in learning and teaching Qur‚Äôan in various Qur‚Äôan memorization centers in Saudi Arabia, especially in the Qassim province. The result is: the time tested techniques of memorization of Qur‚Äôan now has a computational assistant.

The Mushaf ‚Äì As You ‚ÄòTouch‚Äô It: Yes, you can now digitally touch the same mushaf pages that you touch physically. For the first time, With the Qur‚Äôan app now allows users to interact with the exact same pages of the widely used Madani mushaf, Alhamdulillah! The handwritten* Madani mushaf was never before made ‚Äòdigitally touchable‚Äô at the word level. Thanks to the advanced computational algorithms, With the Qur‚Äôan users will feel that they are holding the same mushaf that they physically hold. This unique feature makes the app ‚Äònaturally appealing‚Äô to any student of the Qur‚Äôan.

Personalized Mushaf ‚Äì Digitized: Everyone trying to learn and memorize the Qur‚Äôan ends up having a mushaf full of his/her notes, marks, ideas and comments. With the Qura‚Äôn app allows almost the same tagging capability that are possible with the real printed mushaf. Using years of research in image processing, the exact same pages of Madani mushaf  can be tagged at the word and ayah level.


Personalized Digital Tutor: Everyone trying to memorize the Qur‚Äôan has his/her own difficulties and challenges. Certain ayahs seem difficult to memorize, certain words seem hard to pronounce or some ayahs seem easy to confuse! With the Qur‚Äôan is a gift from huffaz to huffaz. The app allows to tag words or ayahs, with a tagging list coming directly from the experience of highly competent Qur‚Äôan teachers. The personalized tagging allows the app to act like a tutor. Unique test scenarios can be generated for each user, testing both hifz and tajweed.

A lot more features are coming, in-sha-Allah. The current version gives an idea of what is possible in a digital hifz companion. If Allah wills, we will bring you a lot more feature in With the Qur‚Äôan app that will further enhance the learning process of the Noble Qur‚Äôan.

And Allah is the source of success.

Websites: 
http://wtq.ideas2serve.net/
https://www.facebook.com/withthequran/

Email Contact:
wtq@ideas2serve.net

The Mushaf ‚Äì As You ‚ÄòTouch‚Äô It: Yes, you can now digitally touch the same mushaf pages that you touch physically. For the first time, With the Qur‚Äôan app now allows users to interact with the exact same pages of the widely used Madani mushaf, Alhamdulillah! The handwritten* Madani mushaf was never before made ‚Äòdigitally touchable‚Äô at the word level. Thanks to the advanced computational algorithms, With the Qur‚Äôan users will feel that they are holding the same mushaf that they physically hold. This unique feature makes the app ‚Äònaturally appealing‚Äô to any student of the Qur‚Äôan.

Personalized Mushaf ‚Äì Digitized: Everyone trying to learn and memorize the Qur‚Äôan ends up having a mushaf full of his/her notes, marks, ideas and comments. With the Qura‚Äôn app allows almost the same tagging capability that are possible with the real printed mushaf. Using years of research in image processing, the exact same pages of Madani mushaf can be tagged at the word and ayah level.


Personalized Digital Tutor: Everyone trying to memorize the Qur‚Äôan has his/her own difficulties and challenges. Certain ayahs seem difficult to memorize, certain words seem hard to pronounce or some ayahs seem easy to confuse! With the Qur‚Äôan is a gift from huffaz to huffaz. The app allows to tag words or ayahs, with a tagging list coming directly from the experience of highly competent Qur‚Äôan teachers. The personalized tagging allows the app to act like a tutor. Unique test scenarios can be generated for each user, testing both hifz and tajweed.

A lot more features are coming, in-sha-Allah. The current version gives an idea of what is possible in a digital hifz companion. If Allah wills, we will bring you a lot more feature in With the Qur‚Äôan app that will further enhance the learning process of the Noble Qur‚Äôan.

And Allah is the source of success.

Websites:
http://wtq.ideas2serve.net/
https://www.facebook.com/withthequran/

Email Contact:
wtq@ideas2serve.net
summary: Your Hifz Assistant
recentChanges: Indo-Pak mushaf is added with all the features, Alhamdulillah. Ayah pointers are added for the whole Qur'an. Now the app can show the last-viewed-page when started (enable from settings). Hifz tests are improved. Some user interfaces are also improved. Fixed bugs.
comments: MashaAllah the app includes a lot of useful features!!!! We can read and at the same time it will help us to hifz with different testing methods and keep the track. I must say that it is something I always wanted to help me in memorizing Quran. Alhamdu lillah!!!! May Allah subhanahu wa reward those who made this app.

The best app for Hifz and also for regular recitation. So many features in one app is really amazing. I have got everything I wanted. And jazakallah khair for adding indo Pak Hifz mushaf. It would be great in Sha Allah if the app had keeping screen on option. Please add the option. May Allah put barakah in your duniya and akhirah .Ameen.
What can I say about this app! This is absolutely an outstanding one for hifz! With so many useful features!
Masha Allah Excellent software. Does more than what many paid apps do! May Allah Ta'ala reward you immensely.

Ma shaa Allah too good app. It's like i dreamt someday i'd find these types of something. I want to say if pronunciatiom score is added then it'll be better much. Like English guru app added this feature. we are worried about pronunciation. And another one accounting should be added i mean how many times we read after memorization. May Allah grant reward all of you who did this work.

title: War Robots Multiplayer Battles
description:
"Great to see you, Commander!
War Robots is the biggest shooter game about giant robots that fits into your pocket. Join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world and show them who‚Äôs the smartest, fastest, toughest pilot around! Prepare for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and other tricks up enemies‚Äô sleeves. Destroy! Capture! Upgrade! Become stronger ‚Äî and prove yourself as the best mech commander in the War Robots online universe!
MAIN FEATURES
ü§ñ Choose your fighter. Over 50 robots with unique designs and powers let you find a style to call your own.
‚öôÔ∏è Play how you want. Want to crush and destroy? To save and protect? Or just annoy the hell out of your enemies? You can do it all with the massive selection of weapons, including ballistic missiles, plasma cannons, and giant shotguns!
üõ†Ô∏è Customize. Each robot can be fitted with weapons and modules of your choice. Find your favorite combo and show everyone what you‚Äôve got!
üéñÔ∏è Battle together in multiplayer. Team up with other people! Join a powerful clan to find trusty partners (and friends!), or even start your own!
üë®‚ÄçüöÄ Battle on your own. Prefer playing solo? Lone wolves can express themselves in special modes like Arena or Free-for-All!
üìñ Explore the lore. The War Robots world grows and expands with every update, and the ever-growing community is always ready to help you.
Looking for more action?
Check out the latest news on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
‚Ä¶or Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
 
Watch War Robots TV on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS

"

summary: 6v6 PvP Tactical Robo Action
developerAddress: 243, 28 th Oktovriou Street, 7 th Floor, Apartment 702/802, at Christiana Sea View Court, 3035 Limassol, Cyprus
contentRatingDescription: Fantasy Violence, Alcohol and Tobacco Reference, Mild Language
recentChanges:
- HALLOWEEN UPDATE. Join the new metal-fueled event!
- New titan: Minos. Horned monster, fast and menacing
- Titan shotguns: Squall and Grom. Titans aren't just for snipers anymore
- Sonic blasters: Scatter, Havoc, Devastator. Their damage cannot be repaired too easily
- Various optimization tweaks
- Minor bug fixes
- Check the full notes at warrobots.com
comments: Solid game but with a few serious flaws. First, the workshop doesn't produce nearly enough components for you to actually have enough to buy anything. Second, the loot boxes are complete scams and it's impossible to get anything better than the worst few prizes. Last, they expect WAY too much of the player. It's a mobile game guys, people aren't going to spend all day playing it, so don't make limited time prizes that require 300 wins (50 hours of only winning games) in a few days.

Not bad but after the first few levels you will be massively overmatched by people that spend money on the game. And the cost of buying into the game is insanely high. $99.99 for 1 robot, 1 gun and 1 pilot when you have slots for 5 robots with 4 guns apiece? You could end up paying as much as buying a high end gaming PC playing this "free" game.

Used to be a fun game. Now it's a "pay or keep losing game." And they keep coming up with exotic robots with weird abilities and weapons. Would be awesome if they would create an "Old School Mode" for players who just want ro play for fun, not world domination. But I guess they won't make money that way.

This is an extremely fun game, but P2W is beyond imagination. Titans completely ruin the game as they can completely annihilate 3-4 of your own regular bots. The matchmaking is terrible since if you don't have a titan they will still match you with one. The amount of real money you need to invest in this game is out of this world. Grab $500 or months of patient misery to be competitive. Nerf titans or don't play this game. It's like putting college players against peewee kids in any sport. Lol

I have years of experience with WR now and can base my opinions on this. Like any mobile game, pay to win is an issue. With skill, you can match them. I have never bought anything and I am pushing for promotion back to expert after the rebalance. Anything in the game you will eventually be able to make or buy for silver, after it spends some time being exclusive. The graphics have gone wierd after remastered dropped, they looked a lot better before. If I have a gripe, it's that.

title: Norton Mobile Security - Antivirus & Anti-Malware

Norton Mobile Security & Antivirus is an award winning mobile [4] phone security service and virus protection app. This virus detector and remover for androids helps protect your devices against malware, viruses and threats such as malicious apps, theft, and websites designed to steal your information and money. ‚òÖ App Advisor powered by Norton‚Ñ¢ Mobile Insight, automatically checks apps for potential privacy risks, high battery and data usage or intrusive behavior before download. [3]

‚òÖ Android Antivirus: A malware scanner that helps to remove apps that have malware, spyware, or an Android virus that can harm or slow your device. Proactive virus detector, virus cleaner and antivirus protection.[3]

‚òÖ WiFi Security helps your device stay safe when connecting to public Wi-Fi. Wi-Fi Security alerts if an unknown party on the same Wi-Fi network is spying on your online activity, known as a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.

‚òÖ Surveillance App Protection helps protect your online privacy and security by letting you know if an app is sharing your device‚Äôs location, contacts, photos, and messages without your authorization.

‚òÖ Web Protection offers comprehensive phone security while surfing online to help protect you against visiting malicious and phishing sites.

‚òÖ Call Blocking allows you to automatically block calls from specific phone numbers or anonymous or unknown numbers (smartphones only).

---------------------------------------------

Another trusted app from Norton. Norton Security & Antivirus provides proactive anti-malware, spyware and antivirus protection. This virus detector and remover will ensure that your phone security is as tight as it can be.

comments: Look. It works and is effective. However. For the sake of going in educated, know that if you don't know how to unsubscribe via Google Play, Norton is going to make finding out a bad time. They deliberately force you to make an account, force you to share details to contact support, and deliberately provide no information on how to unsubscribe from the service. That type of behavior says a LOT about the ethics of a company. Be aware before making a commitment.

I mainly got this Norton app for the excellent call blocking features... everything else was just a plus. Now, a message on the app indicates the call blocking feature will be discontinued in a future update so that Norton can add some "exciting new features." Nothing could be exciting enough without being able to block calls! I'll finish out the year I paid for and then move to something else....for free!

I have never had the real time fraud and spam call alerts since I've installed the Norton 360 app, I wish it would block telemarketers and robocalls, not only in the calling but also in the messaging. I'm forever getting calls from what I know I've reported to the blocking app, which I have to manually put in the blocking app. I love the safe search feature, I love the play store features that works you of an unsafe app before you download it. I love so far the identity safe features also.

Perfect Mix of Mobile Security & Antivirus Combo For Galaxy Note 4 Running On Android 6.0.1 Everything seems to run well with no issues. I think I'll stick with this current updated version 4.8.0 on my phone since updating to much further might start to have a negative effects on my old operating system. Keep up the good work.üëà

LOUSY! VPN constantly has to be logged into over & over ... AND the app doesn't recognize login info so you are returned to the login screen. The antivirus can be running at the same time but the VPN is a separate app. Very poor design. Added 10/29/20 - just rec'd notice Norton is removing Call Block feature. RUFKM?? That's one of the MOST important features!! Time to find a BETTER security app. Sorry Norton. Your app is not worth the cost anymore.

title: EMERGENCY HQ - free rescue strategy game
description:
The new game in the EMERGENCY series - download the rescue simulator EMERGENCY HQ now!

EMERGENCY HQ is a rescue simulation game. Take control of emergency units, including fire and ambulance, police, SWAT and technical services. Head up operations of rescues, crimes, medical and catastrophe management, dispatch and command vehicles and personnel.
Control firefighters, EMTs, paramedics, doctors, police officers and special forces to fight fires, rescue animals, save lives, fight terrorists and much more. Build up your base and put together the perfect emergency services team! Upgrade your fire trucks, hospital, other buildings and units, expand your headquarters. Use the Fire Department, Rescue Service, Police Department, and Technical Units to master the many exciting and challenging missions!

Join forces in a rescue alliance and support friends in challenging missions. 

Do you have what it takes to be a hero? Fight The Chaos! Play the top firefighter game now!

EMERGENCY HQ - the fire fighter and rescue simulator game - is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don‚Äôt want to use these features, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

comments: I've played this game before, and I love it. But now that I've reinstalled it, it isn't loading. Every time it gets to, let's say, 93%, it crashes and takes me back to my phone's home screen. Then I have to restart the game only to see it crash again. I'm going to give it 4 stars once this bug is fixed, but until then it's going to be 2 stars. I love this game, but please fix all the bugs.

The main qualm i have with this game is how expensive all of the buildings are. I played this game for the longest time and stopped. Now I remember why. Buildings are way too expensive and im having to use gems to skip missions that I cant do becuase I dont have the right units. It's either a time consuming grind or spending real money.

Been playing for a few days and i am really enjoying this game, it seems to be more than fair so its not forcing me into making payments i dont want to make ect, there NO forced ads which is amazing too say. The gameplay is smooth and fun. The missions are repeated sometimes but hey, more money, xp and the 3rd time round its all 3x. Its nice to see a committed and fair developer. Thank You üëåüëçüíô

There is no new exciting things and the game is become boring for me. Earning of coins is low and vehicle call cost is high and upgrade charges are too high. Connecting issue even i am connected to a high speed wifi. Every day 3 to 4 missions i have to skip by using 5 emerald because my base is not enough to complete those missions then why it is showing to me. Earning of emerald is too low per day according to its experience. No new events.

I actually like this game but, from 4 star, I made it 2 star. Since you didnt do anything abt this "CONNECTION ERROR" problem sht. In this game, "BUILDINGS ARE EXPENSIVE". So everytime that connection problem appear, I lost the money i spent for the units. FIX IT THIS TIME. PLEASE... I think every player has the same problem. Atleast return the money back.

title: Brain Out: brain games
description:
Enjoy our Brain Games application every day and boost your IQ. There are 10 games, some are simple, some are hard, some will be easily solved by you and some will challenge you intellectually. Solve them and be a champion. These brain training games will increase your mind skills and will make your brain very smart to solve life problems and difficulties.
All games are free, offline and very useful and interesting for all ages, for kids, for parents, and for everybody!

Brain Games are designed to help you:

- Concentration training 
- Training memory
- Brain training
- Improve Mathematics skills
- Improve logic
- Improve IQ
- Think smart and quick 
- React faster

The application includes 10 brain games:

2. Find words
3. Find numbers
4. Find pairs
5. Find numbers in order

title: FREE NOW (mytaxi) - Taxi Booking App
description:
FREE NOW (formerly mytaxi) is a licensed ride-hailing app for taxis in 10 European countries. Book easily, pay in-app quickly and complete your trip safely!

HOW IT WORKS
1. Enter your destination
2. Book a taxi near you
3. Track your taxi driver's arrival
4. Pay your fare easily through the app

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Prebook a taxi up to 4 days in advance (e.g. for an airport transfer)
‚Ä¢ Hassle-free in-app payment with your credit card
‚Ä¢ Share your ride so friends and family know where you are
‚Ä¢ Rate your driver and let others know how much you enjoyed your taxi ride
‚Ä¢ Save your home and work addresses and book a taxi even faster

SIMPLIFY YOUR BUSINESS TRIPS
Automatically collect your receipt by email after each trip paid through the app or skip manual expense reportings after each business trips by using a FREE NOW business account.

EASY AIRPORT TRANSFER
Book a cab last minute or up to 4 days before your flight. Do you need a pickup? No problem, just collect your luggage, order a cab with our app and follow the in-app walking directions to the FREE NOW pickup point within your Terminal.
FREE NOW is available for both business and holiday travel at Europe's largest airports, including: London Heathrow/City/Gatwick/Stansted, Dublin, Frankfurt, Madrid-Barajas, Barcelona El-Prat, Munich, Rome Fiumicino, Manchester, Lisbon, D√ºsseldorf, Vienna Schwechat, Milano Malpensa, Berlin Tegel and Malaga.

BOOK THE RIGHT TAXI FOR YOU
Taxi XL: Cab with more than 4 seats (vans)
Taxi Wheelchair: Accessible cabs
Taxi Eco: Eco-friendly taxis with electric, gas or hybrid drive
Exec: Luxury cab for business passengers (only in Dublin & Cork)
Match: Share a cab and travel expenses (available in Limerick, Warsaw, Hamburg and Dublin)

SHARE YOUR TAXI EXPERIENCE
Invite friends and family to try out FREE NOW with your personal gift code which you can find in the app and earn credits for your next cab ride.

TRAVEL ALL OVER EUROPE
The FREE NOW cab service is available across 9 countries in around 100 European cities, among them:
UNITED KINGDOM: Brighton, Edinburgh, London, Manchester, Nottingham, Oxford, Reading, Derby, Leicester
IRELAND: Cork, Dublin, Galway, Limerick, Waterford
GERMANY: Aachen, Augsburg, Berlin, Bochum, Bonn, Bremen, Cologne, Dortmund, Dresden, D√ºsseldorf, Duisburg, Essen, Erlangen, Frankfurt, Gelsenkirchen, Hamburg, Hannover, Ingolstadt, Leipzig, L√ºbeck, Mannheim, Munich, M√ºlheim/Ruhr, Nuremberg, Offenbach, Potsdam, Stuttgart, Westerland (Sylt), Wiesbaden
AUSTRIA: Salzburg, Vienna
POLAND: Katowice/Silesian Agglomeration, Krakow, Poznan, Tricity (Gdansk/Sopot/Gdynia), Warsaw, Wroc≈Çaw
ITALY: Milan, Rome, Turin
PORTUGAL: Lisbon, Porto
SPAIN: Barcelona, Madrid, Sevilla, Valencia
ROMANIA: Bucharest

FREE NOW (formerly mytaxi) and Hailo joined forces in 2016 to keep you moving as UK's and Ireland's leading taxi and app.

SUPPORT
If you have any questions, please visit the help & contact section of the app (via your profile) to see our most frequently asked questions. Alternatively, please get in touch at uk.support@free-now.com in the UK, or ireland.support@free-now.com in Ireland.
descriptionHTML:
FREE NOW (formerly mytaxi) is a licensed ride-hailing app for taxis in 10 European countries. Book easily, pay in-app quickly and complete your trip safely!

HOW IT WORKS


1. Enter your destination
2. Book a taxi near you
3. Track your taxi driver's arrival
4. Pay your fare easily through the app

FEATURES


‚Ä¢ Prebook a taxi up to 4 days in advance (e.g. for an airport transfer)
‚Ä¢ Hassle-free in-app payment with your credit card
‚Ä¢ Share your ride so friends and family know where you are
‚Ä¢ Rate your driver and let others know how much you enjoyed your taxi ride
‚Ä¢ Save your home and work addresses and book a taxi even faster

SIMPLIFY YOUR BUSINESS TRIPS


Automatically collect your receipt by email after each trip paid through the app or skip manual expense reportings after each business trips by using a FREE NOW business account.

EASY AIRPORT TRANSFER


Book a cab last minute or up to 4 days before your flight. Do you need a pickup? No problem, just collect your luggage, order a cab with our app and follow the in-app walking directions to the FREE NOW pickup point within your Terminal.
FREE NOW is available for both business and holiday travel at Europe's largest airports, including: London Heathrow/City/Gatwick/Stansted, Dublin, Frankfurt, Madrid-Barajas, Barcelona El-Prat, Munich, Rome Fiumicino, Manchester, Lisbon, D√ºsseldorf, Vienna Schwechat, Milano Malpensa, Berlin Tegel and Malaga.

BOOK THE RIGHT TAXI FOR YOU


Taxi XL: Cab with more than 4 seats (vans)
Taxi Wheelchair: Accessible cabs
Taxi Eco: Eco-friendly taxis with electric, gas or hybrid drive
Exec: Luxury cab for business passengers (only in Dublin & Cork)
Match: Share a cab and travel expenses (available in Limerick, Warsaw, Hamburg and Dublin)

SHARE YOUR TAXI EXPERIENCE


Invite friends and family to try out FREE NOW with your personal gift code which you can find in the app and earn credits for your next cab ride.

TRAVEL ALL OVER EUROPE


The FREE NOW cab service is available across 9 countries in around 100 European cities, among them:
UNITED KINGDOM: Brighton, Edinburgh, London, Manchester, Nottingham, Oxford, Reading, Derby, Leicester
IRELAND: Cork, Dublin, Galway, Limerick, Waterford
GERMANY: Aachen, Augsburg, Berlin, Bochum, Bonn, Bremen, Cologne, Dortmund, Dresden, D√ºsseldorf, Duisburg, Essen, Erlangen, Frankfurt, Gelsenkirchen, Hamburg, Hannover, Ingolstadt, Leipzig, L√ºbeck, Mannheim, Munich, M√ºlheim/Ruhr, Nuremberg, Offenbach, Potsdam, Stuttgart, Westerland (Sylt), Wiesbaden
AUSTRIA: Salzburg, Vienna
POLAND: Katowice/Silesian Agglomeration, Krakow, Poznan, Tricity (Gdansk/Sopot/Gdynia), Warsaw, Wroc≈Çaw
ITALY: Milan, Rome, Turin
PORTUGAL: Lisbon, Porto
SPAIN: Barcelona, Madrid, Sevilla, Valencia
ROMANIA: Bucharest

FREE NOW (formerly mytaxi) and Hailo joined forces in 2016 to keep you moving as UK's and Ireland's leading taxi and app.

SUPPORT


If you have any questions, please visit the help & contact section of the app (via your profile) to see our most frequently asked questions. Alternatively, please get in touch at uk.support@free-now.com in the UK, or ireland.support@free-now.com in Ireland.

comments: I always have to put the reference times and change the account within the organisation to make a booking via my company's account. On top of this, I got a notification saying I couldn't use my company's payment method when my colleagues could. Please fix this because otherwise, it is a great app.

When asking for a drive or taxi, it just show a bumpy taxi icon, and after not even 2min it goes back to my research like I haven't made any request. Very very disappointed. This was working perfectly before and noy anymore.

This app could not be worse. Signed in with facebook, ordered a ride, ride never showed up, got charged for it. Now it wont let me log in because my email address is already registered....that's why I am trying to sign in and not register. Did anyone test this app before releasing?

I chose this app because it indicated that the price for my journey wold be between 87 - 110 euros. On arrival at my destination I was presented with a bill for 159 euros. I don't think I would be inclined to recommend this app
So far no problems with this app doesn't take that long to arrive unlike when calling a cab over the phone and the prices are reasonable

Seeking a challenging new adventure that requires your cunning strategy and outsmarting tactics?

Experiencing fast-paced 3-5 minute strategy battles and whimsical gameplay in the world of Tactical Monsters comprised of fantasy monsters from all time and space. Whether you are competitive in real life or virtual reality, this is the ultimate competition game for you!

GAMEPLAY
Choose your perfect formation of tactical monsters and conquer the epic real-time multiplayer gameplay in this final fantasy war game. Outsmart and destroy your opponents by strategically positioning your monster heroes before battle and tactically controlling their actions in battle, even the auto chess battles!

FEATURES

title: Disability Simulator - Abled
description:
The Disability Simulator by Abled is an application allowing for those with standard vision to experience what those with visual disabilities see each day. Version 1.0 of Abled simulates eight different versions of colorblindness, and Abled 1.0 allows the user to see what color blindness would look like within internet pages, applications and photographs. Created as a tool for learning, Abled hopes to show those with standard vision that color blindness does not mean that a person is unable to see color, but that these persons experience color differently. 

When using Abled, the user will be able to simulate the world with different visual disabilities through the camera. With access to internet browsing, Abled allows the user to see various websites in ways they may not have before, and allows the user to see how those with color blindness may find it difficult when distinguishing various colors utilized within the websites. In addition, Abled allows users to upload and take their own photographs and place these images into the vision simulator. Allowing the user to experience what a person who is color blind may see during day to day life.

title: Therap
description:
The Therap for Android app is designed to be used by people who already have an active Therap account with the appropriate permissions. If you cannot log into the app or once you do not see the functionality you expect, please contact your Provider Administrator.

If you do not have a Therap account but would like to try out the Therap for Android app, please go to www.TherapServices.net and sign up for a demo account.

Therap Services, LLC. is the national leader in providing an integrated solution for documentation, reporting and communication needs of agencies providing support to people with developmental disabilities. 

The Therap for Android app is a collection of modules that enables healthcare professionals (with proper Therap privileges assigned) to use the T-Log, ISP Data, MAR and Password Reset modules.

The Mobile T-Log feature allows users to:
‚Ä¢ View list of unread T-Logs by notification levels
‚Ä¢ Mark T-Logs as read
‚Ä¢ Create new T-Logs with photos
Note: To have access to the T-Log module on Therap for Android app, please ask an administrator at your agency to contact the Regional Sales Representative.

The Mobile ISP Data tool features:
‚Ä¢ Collection of service data from any location
‚Ä¢ Electronic visit verification by recording location through GPS
‚Ä¢ Capturing pictures of individuals at the location of service and adding signatures with finger tips or stylus pens 
Note: To have access to the ISP Data module on Therap for Android app, please ask an administrator at your agency to contact the Regional Sales Representative.

The Mobile MAR feature provides:
‚Ä¢ Access to the list of scheduled medications
‚Ä¢ Ability to Record and administer Scheduled/PRN medications & treatments
‚Ä¢ Options to view allergies, diagnoses, and images of medications
Note: Only current users of the Therap MAR module will be able to access the Mobile MAR from the Therap for Android app.

The Mobile Scheduling/EVV feature provides:
‚Ä¢ Access to view schedules for a particular date on the Agenda List page.
‚Ä¢ Option to check in, check out and add comments after the service delivery.
Note: To have access to the Scheduling/EVV module on Therap for Android app, please ask an administrator at your agency to contact the Regional Sales Representative.

Users with the Reset Password administrative role will be able to access the Password Reset tool from the app.

https://help.therapservices.net/app/answers/detail/a_id/4020/#ReleaseNotes2020.3.0.MobileApp20.3
comments: Wouldn't even use if my employer hadn't made us switch to this app in our early stages of paperless data entry. You won't even know what to do unless someone is trained to instruct you and your coworkers on how to navigate. Now tell me, as a medical professional in personal care (in home/residential), how can you tailor to my data recording when my schizophrenic as well as intellectually disabled individual I care for thinks I'm texting his fixed delusion of his arch-nemesis causing negative

This app is a hit and miss. Since there's only one PC at my company I never have time to do my daily reports before I leave. So this app helps in that regard. However, the UI is missing a lot of options/ features that are on the desktop version. So either I have to use my laptop at home to finish all my reports or wait until I get into work that day. Not to mention it's pretty buggy and takes about two attempts to reach it's online servers.
I use this for work but it won't let me clock out or do the tasks I need to. If my work company didn't use this app I would want nothing to do with it.

Every update makes this app less user friendly and more tedious to use. ISP Data has now been updated so there is yet another step before being able to document, and schedules as well as most of the features my companies managers need to use for work are still inaccessible on the app. Everything we used to be able to do in one step on the last program we used now takes 3-4 steps.

I've noticed this app is always upgrading and its the unusual times, how can staff complete notes and submitt clockin as well clockout when system is down!!! This results in lost time or unpaid time due to not being able submitt notes on time. On Sept 4 system was down and Sept 5 system would allow staff to leave notes for each goal ,yet the system shows past entries!!! Such a inconvenience, I think agency's should return to the paper form .

title: Budding Minds Early Learning FREE
description:
Budding Minds is a set of early learning activities for preschool children and also useful for people with learning disabilities etc.

Featuring 60 educational and learning exercises set over 12 activities, both young and old minds are challenged using Animals, Shapes, Colours, Numbers, Alphabet, Puzzles, Fruits, Vegetables, Music, Sounds and many other interactive features. Using some of the best speech synthesis available to interact with the young student.

Children will learn basic kindergarten and primary level lessons, train their brain having fun at the same time whilst interacting with the colourful easy to use user interface.

Gold stars and encouragement are awarded as the activities are completed whilst displaying the total brain power of the budding learner. All data can be parent/teacher reset, allowing for others to learn with the exact same activities and create comparison results for parents and teachers alike.

The educational learning activities include:

Musical Dweebs
Spot The Difference
Object Sort
Alphabet Soup
Jigsaw Puzzle
Memory Test
Shape Match
Sliding Puzzle
Odd One Out
Find The Object
Learn Colours
Funny Numbers

title: Plaphoons for Android - Beta
description:
Plaphoons for Android helps users with speech disability to communicate through their Android tablet device (even though it runs on any device). It provides several sets of symbols that can be arranged by topic or frequency of use. Each symbol is associated to a word or phrase and will be read out when selected.

You can choose a Plaphoons file (.pla) that has been created with the desktop version of Plaphoons - making this app as nice as you like.
Select a file from the sd card via preferences, e.g. using OI Filemanager. Make sure the the images used in Plaphoons are compatible with your Android device (e.g. avoid .wmf files)

Currently, developed for tablets, but can be used on phones as well with limitations.

For the pre-installed sample set of symbols the text-to-speech configuration has to be switch to french! Ideally a better TTS-engine and voice should be installed.

The source code is available at https://github.com/openintents/plaphoons-for-android

- Improve Mathematics skills
- Improve logic
- Improve IQ
- Think smart and quick 
- React faster

title: Mind map & note taking tool - MindMeister
description:
Whether you're using it for mind mapping, project planning, brainstorming/idea management, note-taking or presentations, MindMeister can help you organize, prioritize, and even generate new ideas. MindMeister lets you share your mind maps with as many friends or colleagues as you want and collaborate with them in real-time.

Designed from the ground up as an extension to our award-winning, browser-based interface, the MindMeister app stores your mobile creations and seamlessly syncs them with your online account.


Feature highlights:
‚úî Create and edit graphical mind maps
‚úî Seamlessly sync maps and folders with your free online account
‚úî Share maps directly from the device
‚úî Multi-touch support for drag & drop, zoom, pan 
‚úî Add icons, colors, styles, boundaries and map themes
‚úî Edit and view notes, links and tasks on ideas
‚úî Draw connections between topics
‚úî Export as RTF
‚úî Manage Favorites
‚úî Play map-based presentations on your device

Additional features for a paid MindMeister account:
‚úî Export as MindManager, Freemind, PDF, image, MS Word and MS PowerPoint
‚úîUnlimited mind maps
‚úîAttach files and images
‚úîPriority Support

Additional features through www.MindMeister.com interface:
‚úî Unlimited undo/redo
‚úî Import from MindManager, Freemind, Mind and text files

What can you use Mind maps for?
‚úî Idea Management
   - Capture, manage and implement ideas
‚úî Brainstorming
   - Visual real-time brainstorming for teams
‚úî Project Planning
   - Design plans together and put them into reality together
‚úî Note Taking
   - Take meaningful and efficient notes
‚úî Knowledge Management
   - Manage the collective intelligence of your team
‚úî Meeting Management
   - Visualize your agenda, take notes, assign tasks to the persons responsible and work together

NOTE: Requires a free account registration. 


Privacy policy: https://www.mindmeister.com/privacy

title: Belajar Membaca
description:
Aplikasi untuk belajar membaca yang disusun dengan lengkap dan berurut sehingga bisa membantu anak belajar membaca dengan mudah dari nol sampai bisa.

1. Terdiri dari 70 tingkatan yang di susun sedemikian rupa sehingga anak bisa membaca rangkaian huruf secara bertahap dari yang termudah sampai anak bisa membaca kalimat.
2. Setiap tingkatan disertai tes untuk mengasah kemampuan membaca anak secara bertahap.
3. Setiap tingkatan baru disertai pengulangan tingkatan sebelumnya untuk melancarkan pemahaman sebelumnya dan membangun kemampuan membaca anak sampai lengkap.
4.	Setiap kata disertai audio sehingga anak bisa memeriksa sendiri atau sebagai acuan jika anak mengalami kesulitan.
5. Suara audio menggunakan suara anak-anak yang memotifasi anak untuk bisa membaca.
6. Disertai gambar dekoratif dan warna yang menarik untuk anak-anak.
7. Disertai 10 cerita pendek yang mendidik di akhir tingkatan untuk mempraktikan kemampuan membaca anak.

Aplikasi ini di desain sebagai bahan mengajar orang tua/ guru dan bisa juga digunakan untuk belajar mandiri anak. Berikan arahan kepada anak cara belajar dengan aplikasi ini dengan benar sebelum anak belajar sendiri.

Instruksi penggunaan aplikasi:
1. Tingkat 1.1 Mengenal Huruf, tidak harus dihafal. Cukup untuk pengenalan saja.
2. Untuk level 1.2 dan selanjutnya, setiap tingkatan disertai contoh. Arahkan anak untuk mendengar contoh sampai selesai. Jangan sentuh tombol MULAI sebelum selesai.
3. Cobalah untuk mengikuti contoh.
4. Sentuh tombol MULAI untuk memulai latihan.
5. PENTING: Dorong anak mencoba membaca sendiri terlebih dahulu sebelum menekan tombol pengeras suara (speaker). Gunakan tombol pengeras suara hanya untuk memeriksa benar tidaknya bacaan, atau jika benar-benar lupa atau tidak bisa membaca kata tersebut.
6. Jika anak mengalami beberapa kali kesulitan, cobalah untuk mengulang tingkatan tersebut sampai anak benar-benar paham dan bisa membaca walaupun tidak begitu lancar.
7. Dorong anak untuk selalu mendapatkan nilai 100 sebelum melanjutkan ke tingkatan berikutnya.
8. Anak akan mampu membaca dengan lancar dengan sendirinya setelah berlatih tingkatan demi tingkatan. Jangan membuat anak menghafal kata. Yang terpenting adalah kemampuan anak untuk menalar rangkaian huruf menjadi bunyi dan kata.

title: Mech Arena: Robot Showdown
description:
Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is a FREE competitive multiplayer mech shooter with deep gameplay, intense team battles, and lush 3D graphics. 
 
With levels designed for tight, fast PvP game play, battles take about five minutes. During a battle, you‚Äôll spend every moment with guns blazing. Real-time 5 vs 5 big bad robot combat never looked this good!
 
Choose from dozens of weapons and war robots with special abilities for endless battle combinations, then customize them for each new war. Meet friends and form teams to dictate the tides of war in exciting Control Point Capture matches or brutal Team Deathmatch battles.
 
Like taking the high ground? Back up your team with a sniper mech. Want to get up close and personal? Respawn, re-arm your war robots with autocannons, and jump back in. With instant live matchmaking, you go from pocket to watching robots battle in less than 30 seconds!
 
Pulverize the rankings, crush global Tournaments, customize everything, and carve out your legend as the baddest pilot in Mech Arena: Robot Showdown. Be a smart shooter... the world is watching!
 
‚ãáFEATURES‚ãá
 
REAL-TIME 5v5 PvP BATTLES
 
Test your skill against real players from around the world in live mech wars. Take your shooter friends with you in complex team gameplay and conquer the rankings together as your robots battle for glory!
 
COMPETITIVE GAMEPLAY
 
With rankings and achievements, there are tons of ways to win medals and prizes for your war bots. When you‚Äôre ready, join Tournaments to prove your worth in all-out PvP mech wars. Rise up the divisions, pick up gear, and strike fear.
 
JUST POINT AND SHOOT
 
Simple and intuitive controls make it easy to get the hang of your war robots even in your first PvP battle. Want to play it your way? Customize the controls so your war bots fit your needs. Then, go out there and dominate the mech wars!
 
THE RIGHT MECH FOR THE RIGHT JOB
 
Are you a scout? Sniper? Shooter that just runs in, guns blazing? There‚Äôs a mech loadout for you. Apply unique skins or add paint jobs to make your war robots stand out.
 
TEAM UP FOR BATTLES
 
Get your friends together, plan your team strategies, design complimentary war bots, and fight in mech wars side-by-side. Bring in allies from Facebook, or find new ones on the battlefield. Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is like a LAN party in your pocket!
 
UNIQUE GAME MAPS
 
Fight up close in the Mech Arena. Run PvP missions at the Mesa Verde facility, or watch robots battle among the stars at Elon Station Gray. Shoot down enemy war bots under the neon lights of Neo Hokkaido, or fight through frosty Patterson Station. 
 
TONS OF WEAPONS
 
Attack from cover with long-range artillery, shoot around corners with smart missiles, freeze war bots with stasis guns, or rely on good old kinetic and energy weapons. Your robots battle with them all. They‚Äôre all upgradeable, so go nuts.
 
SPECIAL MECH ABILITIES
 
Blind your opponents with targeting jammers. Shoot your war robots forward at ramming speed. Deploy energy shields, repair fields, jump jets, mines, and more.
 
NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM
 
Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is a shooter designed to work on most 4G/LTE networks. It should work as well as your carrier does. You can (and should) fight mech wars and watch robots battle wherever you can get away with it.
 
PLEASE NOTE:
 
‚Ä¢ Items are available for purchase in Mech Arena: Robot Showdown. Some paid items may not be refundable depending on the type of item.
‚Ä¢ Mech Arena: Robot Showdown is available in English and Russian.
‚Ä¢ This is an early Beta version of the game. We need your help to make it better, so please give us your feedback at: arena.support@plarium.com
 
Official Website:  https://plarium.com/
Mech Arena: Robot Showdown Support: arena.support@plarium.com
Mech Arena: Robot Showdown Community: https://plarium.com/forum/en/mech-arena/
Privacy Policy: http://plarium.com/#/doc/policy/
Terms of Use: http://plarium.com/#/doc/terms/

title: Laws and Legal Issues
description:
***US Laws and Legal Issues App is owned by a private company not affiliated, endorsed, authorized, or licensed by the United States government or United States Courts.

App Features:

Interactive and beautiful user interface
SignIn with Google, Facebook & Email
Beautiful on-boarding screen
Category based laws and legal articles
Realtime push notification with every article posted
Search feature
Bookmark feature
User likes & comments feature

App categories:

Complaints
Learn how to file complaints and complain more effectively to resolve common consumer problems.

Crime and Prisons
Learn about reporting crimes or criminals and find frequently requested information about prisons.

Federal Laws and Regulations
Learn some of the basics about U.S. laws, regulations, and executive orders, and discover resources to find out more.

Labor Laws and Issues
Learn about some important employment laws and issues.

Personal Legal Issues, Documents, and Family History
Get legal help, replace documents and learn about your family history.

Scams and Frauds
Learn how to protect yourself from and respond to scams and frauds.

Voting and Election Laws and History
Know the laws that protect your right to vote and govern the elections process. Find results of past federal elections. Learn how voting methods and habits have evolved.

Your Legal Disability Rights
Know your rights under federal law. Read about the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), which protects people‚Äôs rights regarding employment, public accommodations, state and local government services, and more. Learn about special accommodations for travelers and voters. Know how to fight job discrimination.


Sources of the information in the app: 
https://www.usa.gov

title: The Epoch Times: Live & Breaking News
description:
The Epoch Times App serves you with trusted news wherever you are. Get instant access to award-winning journalism, breaking, political, US, China, and world news, as well as news on arts and culture, and more.

With The Epoch Times App you can browse our digital content, including in-depth coverage of China, unbiased reporting on US politics and the 2020 election.
You will also get access to our premium shows such as Declassified, American Thoughts Leaders,  Crossroads, The China Report, China Uncensored, Zooming In as well as commentaries and documentaries on issues that matter. 

Download the  app to experience our digital publishing platform. 

MAIN APP FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ Top section: See important events and hot topics in the US, China and around the world at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Breaking news alerts: Get the latest news in a timely manner as they happen.
‚Ä¢ Livestream notification:  Watch live broadcasts of major events in the US and around the world.
‚Ä¢ Video section: Enjoy exclusive, original series, inspiring videos as well as documentaries.
‚Ä¢ Opinion: Read political, social, and personal commentaries. 
‚Ä¢ Save articles into your personalized reading list.
‚Ä¢ Share content easily on all major social media platforms such as Twitter and Facebook as well as via email or text message.
‚Ä¢ Adjust font size in articles. 


Terms of service: https://www.theepochtimes.com/terms-of-service
Privacy policy: https://www.theepochtimes.com/privacy-notice


TECHNICAL HELP AND ASSISTANCE:
We are working hard to ensure our readers have an excellent experience using our app! If you have any questions about how the app works, want to provide us with insightful feedback, or experience any technical difficulties such as crashes, please contact us at app@epochtimes.nyc. This way our developers can identify and resolve issues in a timely manner.

comments: One of the best news source bar none. Multiple choices for different areas of interest and special and breaking news and world events. They even have an entertainment and game section. Too much to mention. They provide the facts and they have real, not fake news and an opinion section with seasoned reporters. The video section and news channels will make you glad you took a solid step into the light and out of the darkness of the legacy media. Highest recommendation.

Great app, up-to-date news with excellent research and reporting involved, especially as it concerns China, which had otherwise kicked out or sent money to most major networks. I would have given it less stars, as I don't like the subscription price ($5 a month or no fee and some ads would be better) but I don't read many more than the few 'free articles' advertised as the option for non-subscribers.

My my favorite news source! real news. In a world filled with fake news the Epoch Times stands out. The Epoch Times has held on to the original spirit of the news, sharing the facts with the people. They go after the stories the corrupt mainstream media and turned a blind eye to as it does not fit their agenda. The Epoch Times does not do this. Prepare for a breath of fresh air as you read some real news by real journalists about real events happening in our world. Thank you Epoch Times.

Was a great app! I was really enjoying it till the sneaky upgrade now limits you and now has ads AND forces you to subscribe! $77 special rate and then $192 /yr??? ...for an app??? You lost me. I will be deleting like many others. No thanks!

my very favorite source of news. Easy to scroll down through the stories and click on the one I'm interested in. I love that I can scroll down through a story and find a video click on along with the names I need to go on YouTube for the research. I prefer to listen to the actual people rather than having people tell me what they think that person said and the epoch times has been my best source of obtaining the names behind the story.

title: Learnia: Spelling & Math Tutor. Lessons& Exercises
description:
Wouldn't it be great if kids would enjoy learning Math and Spelling skills?
The Land Of Learnia teaches to grade 1, 2 and 3. It is free and does not contain ads.


‚ÄúA Very high-quality app that young children will enjoy.‚Äù-BestAppsForKids
‚ÄúLearnia combines the best of mobile gaming and digital learning in one app.‚Äù -TheIMums
‚ÄúIts 3D graphics are used intelligently by its well-constructed learning activities.‚Äù - EducationalAppStore


WHAT DO KIDS LEARN?
Learnia teaches spelling and maths to kids in grade 1, 2 and 3. (Ages 5 to 8)
Math covers the full common core curriculum.


HOW DO KIDS LEARN IT?
The Land Of Learnia is stuffed with 100s of fun exercises, lectures and challenges. These are organized on ‚Äòskill stones‚Äô. Kids explore and master skill stones at their own pace and in the order they prefer.


WHAT KIND OF EXERCISES?
Exercises are hands-on. Kids move marbles into circles, move the hands on a clock, pour liquids into vessels, Move cubes in 100s, 10s and 1s, stack blocks etc.
Children spell words by moving letters, solve word puzzles and write numbers as handwriting.
Learnia is the tablet version of sensorial materials.


HOW IS THIS FUN FOR KIDS?
Kids earn rewards and buy pets (üê∞ üêß üê∏) to feed and look after. 
In addition kids earn üéÅ game time that can be used to play 6 brainy games.


WHAT IS THIS ‚ÄòWORLD TO EXPLORE' ?
The Land Of Learnia is a 3D world of islands with 2 paths running through. The paths (spelling and math) are blocked by ‚Äòskill stones‚Äô. Each skill stone teaches one topic and contains a number of exercises, lectures and a test. When kids master a skill stone it will step aside.


IS LEARNIA SUITABLE FOR USE IN CLASSROOM?
Learnia‚Äôs features make it a great tool in the classroom. Teachers üë©‚Äçüè´ (and parents üë™) can remotely view student progress in real time.
Learnia remembers mistakes so that teachers and parents can review missed questions with children at any time.
Although it presents a fun environment, kids spend the majority of their time learning productively.
Learnia contains the full (no holes) common core curriculum for grade 1,2 and 3 maths.


WILL YOUNG KIDS BE ABLE TO USE LEARNIA UNASSISTED?
The interface is designed specifically for young kids and tablets. Numbers can be input using a handwriting system ‚úçÔ∏è. Buttons are large and colorful and kept to a minimum. The world is fun, frustration-free and invites exploration.


WHY IS IT FREE?
‚ÄòThe Land Of Learnia‚Äô is a young product breaking into a crowded market. The current content will remain free to reward our early-bird customers.


EDUCATIONAL FEATURES.
Learnia is using a child-led philosophy using scaffolding.
It is using (optional) subtitles to assist children with hearing difficulties and is suitable for adhd, add and gifted kids. It is ideal for enrichment.


HOW ABOUT HOMESCHOOLING?
Learnia is great for homeschooling. Kids learn by themselves needing only a minimum of help. Learnia gives teachers and parents some breathing room.


WHAT DOES MATH COVER?
Number sense, rounding, 1, 2 and 3 digit addition, subtraction, multiplication, shapes, telling time üïë, fractions.
Measurements: length, volume, weight, data representation. üìä
Counting money available in 7 currencies. üíµ üí∂ üí∑
And much more‚Ä¶


WHAT DOES SPELLING COVER?
A total of 120 spelling lessons each with around 16 words. Kids solve crosswords and word search puzzles as well as many fun exercises to study for the final challenge.


CAN KIDS GO BETWEEN HOME AND CLASSROOM?
All progress is stored on-line. With a simple password, children can play using any tablet. Kids can play at home and at school. All progress will be synched.


ANYTHING ELSE?
A friendly owl ü¶â helps kids on their journey of learning.
Stimulating background music üéµ during exercises.



The Land Of Learnia¬Æ;  Where kids love to learn.

HOW DO KIDS LEARN IT?
The Land Of Learnia is stuffed with 100s of fun exercises, lectures and challenges. These are organized on ‚Äòskill stones‚Äô. Kids explore and master skill stones at their own pace and in the order they prefer.


WHAT KIND OF EXERCISES?
Exercises are hands-on. Kids move marbles into circles, move the hands on a clock, pour liquids into vessels, Move cubes in 100s, 10s and 1s, stack blocks etc.
Children spell words by moving letters, solve word puzzles and write numbers as handwriting.
Learnia is the tablet version of sensorial materials.


HOW IS THIS FUN FOR KIDS?
Kids earn rewards and buy pets (üê∞ üêß üê∏) to feed and look after.
In addition kids earn üéÅ game time that can be used to play 6 brainy games.


WHAT IS THIS ‚ÄòWORLD TO EXPLORE' ?
The Land Of Learnia is a 3D world of islands with 2 paths running through. The paths (spelling and math) are blocked by ‚Äòskill stones‚Äô. Each skill stone teaches one topic and contains a number of exercises, lectures and a test. When kids master a skill stone it will step aside.


IS LEARNIA SUITABLE FOR USE IN CLASSROOM?
Learnia‚Äôs features make it a great tool in the classroom. Teachers üë©‚Äçüè´ (and parents üë™) can remotely view student progress in real time.
Learnia remembers mistakes so that teachers and parents can review missed questions with children at any time.
Although it presents a fun environment, kids spend the majority of their time learning productively.
Learnia contains the full (no holes) common core curriculum for grade 1,2 and 3 maths.


WILL YOUNG KIDS BE ABLE TO USE LEARNIA UNASSISTED?
The interface is designed specifically for young kids and tablets. Numbers can be input using a handwriting system ‚úçÔ∏è. Buttons are large and colorful and kept to a minimum. The world is fun, frustration-free and invites exploration.


WHY IS IT FREE?
‚ÄòThe Land Of Learnia‚Äô is a young product breaking into a crowded market. The current content will remain free to reward our early-bird customers.


EDUCATIONAL FEATURES.
Learnia is using a child-led philosophy using scaffolding.
It is using (optional) subtitles to assist children with hearing difficulties and is suitable for adhd, add and gifted kids. It is ideal for enrichment.


HOW ABOUT HOMESCHOOLING?
Learnia is great for homeschooling. Kids learn by themselves needing only a minimum of help. Learnia gives teachers and parents some breathing room.


WHAT DOES MATH COVER?
Number sense, rounding, 1, 2 and 3 digit addition, subtraction, multiplication, shapes, telling time üïë, fractions.
Measurements: length, volume, weight, data representation. üìä
Counting money available in 7 currencies. üíµ üí∂ üí∑
And much more‚Ä¶


WHAT DOES SPELLING COVER?
A total of 120 spelling lessons each with around 16 words. Kids solve crosswords and word search puzzles as well as many fun exercises to study for the final challenge.


CAN KIDS GO BETWEEN HOME AND CLASSROOM?
All progress is stored on-line. With a simple password, children can play using any tablet. Kids can play at home and at school. All progress will be synched.


ANYTHING ELSE?
A friendly owl ü¶â helps kids on their journey of learning.
Stimulating background music üéµ during exercises.



The Land Of Learnia¬Æ; Where kids love to learn.

title: Word Life - Connect crosswords puzzle
description:
‚≠êÔ∏èMillions of players love this free crossword puzzle game. Join them today! ‚≠êÔ∏è

Word Life is a free crossword and anagrams game. Hunt and connect letters to spell words in this relaxing vocabulary game. Your daily brain training is now called Word Life! 

 More than 6000 levels to play connect word games, anagrams and daily crosswords

Get your dose of daily brain training with this free crossword puzzle word game. Lovers of classic word games like Scrabble, crosswords or anagrams will love this word hunt and spell vocabulary game. You can connect to play words with friends, play a daily crossword solo, or solve and spell anagrams wherever you are! 

Word Life also has many addictive special event word games, such as the Feed Katie event. Katie is a cute cat that eats word cookies! Scrabble the anagrams to connect and spell and feed word cookies to Katie, and watch her grow! 

There's a whole word of wonders to explore in this free crossword puzzle. Word hunt, scrabble & scramble words, to spell and collect word cookies. Build word stacks to win prizes and hints with relaxing word scapes in every level. 

Word Life - Connect crossword word games features:
‚Ä¢ Infinite word connect puzzles: anagrams, word hunt, word scramble and other free word games
‚Ä¢ Daily crossword brain training: collect letters and spell words in this vocabulary game
‚Ä¢ Easy to learn: challenging word game for lovers of Scrabble!
‚Ä¢ Daily crossword events: Feed word cookies to Katie the cat! 
‚Ä¢ Relaxing scenery: Different word scapes to journey through. Welcome to a word of wonders! 
‚Ä¢ Word scramble: scrabble the letters to connect hidden words and spell word stacks 
‚Ä¢ Spell words with friends: connect to word hunt online with your friends
‚Ä¢ Collect personalised word game tiles

Word Life is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases on your phone or tablet settings.

comments: Without a doubt, this game is fun & a brain changer. However, rebooting the game sfter every play is pathetic to say the least. For that reason I am considering un-installing, which I did. Now, 7 months later I thought I would give it a try once again. Nothing has been done to improve the situation. Seems like it worse than before. This time it is good-bye forever.

Love this game! Trivia is my favorite. Challenging questions and not much time to answer!! The tiles offered are really cool, as are the rewards when you win. Puzzles are challenging, too. Overall, game keeps my mind sharp! ***OH, one change I really appreciate is during trivia. When you can't answer in time, the game now shows you the answer before closing out. That used to drive me nuts not knowing the right answer for next time. Thanks for updating!***

Fun word game. Coins (which you can buy with real money) get you very little. I wish you could buy hints with them. I paid for ad-free but I still am asked way too often if I want to purchase coins - no, and stop asking, thanks. Recent updates made the daily game clearer. They added a little bee to help out. It's annoying, and covers part of the puzzle.

Falsely advertised as a different game; plus all extra words gained in piggy bank has to be Bought back by me!..for 3.99- you must be kidding; then I have to advertise on other social media to promote this game!?.. for supposed extra coins! I am totally disappointed...where is the original game that was advertised for choosing the correct word that sound the same but have different meanings?

It was advertised on trivia crack as a grammar game. I love grammar and when I saw that advertisement for choosing different words with same sounds and you had to choose which one would be correct in the sentence, I didn't miss a beat to install. Then when I opened it, it was just the basic word cookies, or swipe to get the words. It's falsely advertised. Uninstalled right away. It also was pushing you to spend money so even if you do like this sort of game, I don't reccommend this version.

title: Dialoger - Fast & Easy AAC
description:
Features of the Dialoger application :

Capable of creating sentences as quickly as possible.

While appropriate or possible options appear on the screen, unappropriate ones disappear.
Thus, you get the fastest results without any confusion on a simple screen.

With nouns and verbs represented by images, it can be used easily by mute people or those who are unable to read 
and write or have difficulties to do so.

Autistic people or mentally and physically disabled people with difficulties in language, speech and learning, those who are bedridden, elderly people, or those who are freshly-operated are given the possibility to carry out the most commonly used dialogues.

By pressing Play, every noun or verb is voiced and the final complete phrase is played from the top by pressing play.

Apart from solving communication problems, it is also used to learn the basic sentence structure, to understand and develop your English.



Some of the dialogue topics in the app :
Health
Wanted's
Needs
Activities
Emotional and physical situations
Eating and drinking
Emergencies



About AAC :
You may have seen someone write in a notebook to answer a question. Maybe you have seen people using sign language or other gestures. You may have seen someone push buttons on a computer that speaks for them. These are all forms of augmentative and alternative communication, or AAC. 

AAC includes all of the ways we share our ideas and feelings without talking. We all use forms of AAC every day. You use AAC when you use facial expressions or gestures instead of talking. You use AAC when you write a note and pass it to a friend or coworker. We may not realize how often we communicate without talking.  

People with severe speech or language problems may need AAC to help them communicate. Some may use it all of the time. Others may say some words but use AAC for longer sentences or with people they don‚Äôt know well. AAC can help in school, at work, and when talking with friends and family.  


Our Dialoger App is continuously improved. Those who use the app, their family, relatives, close friends, caregivers and teachers can make suggestions about what to add or change.

Gentlemen, start your engines! Get your car ready and start playing Drive for Speed Simulator. Drive your car through a city full of obstacles. Complete different missions around town before time runs out and try to earn as much money as you can. Use your money to buy brand new faster cars and complete missions in less time.

Drive for Speed Simulator also has a Free Ride mode to take advantage of its sandbox city. Drive around and have fun in this amazing game for Android. Download Drive for Speed Simulator now!

In Drive for Speed Simulator, choose among 20 different cars to buy and play. Customize your cars with different items: spoilers, tires, rims, paint and motor upgrades!

What are you waiting for? Start playing Drive for Speed Simulator now!

title: Teen and Adult Phonics Library ‚Äî School Edition
description:
The Teen and Adult Phonics (TAP) Library offers a growing collection of sequential, decodable digital novels with edgy, engaging themes designed to appeal to teenagers and adults. Care has been taken to build a positive experience for older emergent readers, especially those with SpLD such as dyslexia, ASD or ADHD.

The School Edition includes FULL ACCESS to every story in the collection (no IAP).  Future updates will bring NEW TEXTS and these will also be fully accessible through this version of the app AT NO ADDITIONAL COST.  Please note that the regular edition of the TAP Library app is free to download and includes samples of every story should you wish to examine the collection before buying.

* BUILD CONFIDENCE with FULLY DECODABLE TEXTS

TAP novels support the teaching of systematic and cumulative phonics to older learners, especially those with learning difficulties like dyslexia. Minimal use of ‚Äúweird words‚Äù‚Äînon or not yet decodable words‚Äîallows teens and adults to experience success in reading and grow into confident emergent readers. 

* PRESERVE DIGNITY

Older learners with severe reading difficulties don‚Äôt want to be handed another levelled reader or ‚Äùbaby book‚Äù. These apps combine high-quality, age-appropriate images with clean design. Support materials and level information are kept off the cover and out of the main text to give learners a ‚Äúnovel reading‚Äù experience to be proud of. Progress through the book is indicated and encouraged with feedback designed for older learners.


* SUPPORT DYSLEXIC LEARNERS

Attention to the needs of learners with dyslexia or other difficulties (ASD, ADHD) has gone into every feature of the app:

- Open Dyslexia as a font option
- distractions on pages with text are minimal (no movement or sound unless the user interacts with the app)
- easily accessible page numbers and colour coded chapters along the margins
- swipe or non-swipe page navigation allows a reader to touch the page to aid decoding without accidentally changing pages
- images and sound are optional
- optional white noise for masking classroom noise
- save learner preferences and location in each book in a user profile
- unlimited user profiles


* SYSTEMATIC AND CUMULATIVE PHONICS

The library currently contains four novels at TAP Level 2. Level 2 texts are written using fully decodable words of the following types: CVC, CCVC, CCVCC, CV (open syllable). Words can include the consonant digraphs sh, th, ch, wh, qu and ending sounds ck, ng, nk . A small number of single-syllable open-syllable words (eg. ‚Äúshe‚Äù) and a very small number of ‚Äúweird words‚Äù (non or not yet decodable words) are used in each book. Users can set their preference for UK or US vocabulary and spelling (eg. ‚Äùmum‚Äù versus ‚Äúmom‚Äù, ‚Äùbin‚Äù versus ‚Äùtrash‚Äù). More information on the TAP phonics progression is available on our website, FocusOnTAP.com.

* DESIGNED BY A READING AND DYSLEXIA SPECIALIST

Victoria Leslie, a reading and dyslexia specialist based in Australia, designed the TAP series and is writing each of these high-interest novels. These texts are for use by specialist dyslexia/literacy teachers, schools and parents as well as teens and adults seeking to learn to read.

title: Drive Simulator
description:
Drive over 15 vehicles, operate large cranes and machines, complete easy and complex objectives and explore a large detailed open world environment. Drive simulator 2016 is like no other simulator,  it's the complete simulation package packed with variety of objective based levels such as: 

- Airport: Tow airplane, unload luggage and passengers, refuel plane etc..
- Construction: Demolish and build, transport machinery, operate large cranes etc..
- Depot: Remove and replace vents, transport light goods etc..
- Dockyard: Unload containers, operate large cranes, transport heavy cargo etc..
- Recovery: Recover broken down vehicles   

Features:
- Detailed 3D environment
- Over 15 Vehicles to drive
- 5 different Modes to choose from
- Operate cranes, machines, large trucks, trailers and trolleys
- easy controls

Minimum Requirements: dual core 1.0ghz - 1GB RAM

http://appforgegames.com/privacypolicy.html

comments: This game is the best.It has clear graphics which is my favourite and you can drive properly.The reason why I am giving this 4 stars is because there needs to be a map and there need s to be other SUV like ford ranger,Toyota hilux legend 50,amarok,landcruiser and more.there also has to be long trips like which take 2 hours to get there and some music please fix this problem and then I will give it a 5 star out of and I will follow you on Facebook and Twitter and I will send feedbacks.

This is cool game concept. Benifits include no time pressure. Great camera control, never thought I say it, but a little to touchy. Like many other drive sims, I have an issue with aggressive traffic. Some idot drivers are reality, but I hate that all cars on road,will crash into you if your to slow,and act like you can't get out of the way fast enough. Tone this down and you have a great sim w/great graphics. Just plain fun! After all part of the drive & haul world is being slow. Give it a try!

This game looks like it could be really fun. I've played drive simulators before, so I know the controls can be tricky on a phone, but this game is extremely difficult to control. Plus some have a steering wheel and others have left right buttons. Added 1 star for availability via Play Pass.

Very hard to control...You get stuck on everything.. Camera is very bad you can barely control it...If I was you I wouldn't get it...It's just bad...I would give it a zero star if there was one..I don't even no why it has 4. Stars.. everyone gives it a 2 or 1 star...No hate on the creaters on this game tho....I wouldn't get it if I was you..

The game is Too funny but hard also . The graphics are super but one problem is there the other vehicles are doing to bad . They are trashing to our car . Only this this problem is there.and all are good

title: HAWKi - Illinois Tech mobile
description:
Illinois Institute of Technology has ventured into the world of mobile apps! HAWKi is now available for your Android phone and tablet.

IIT students can download this free mobile app that will give you anytime, anywhere access to information that is critical to your student experience at Illinois Tech.

HAWKi will put at your fingertips the ability to participate in classes, check grades, see holds, get dining hall information, use geo-location to navigate the campus, and so much more!

HAWKi provides students with secure access to the most important information you need with features like:

‚óè Courses ‚Äì View your course assignments, class rosters, grades, discussions and class announcements/updates
‚óè Library ‚Äì Browse and search content in the Galvin Library
‚óè Holds ‚Äì Receive mobile notification if a hold should happen and require action
‚óè Events ‚Äì Check out all the latest happenings on campus
‚óè Bookstore ‚Äì Access the IIT Bookstore
‚óè News ‚Äì Read the latest campus news
‚óè Dining Hall ‚Äì Browse, search and locate dining options for your campus
‚óè Maps ‚Äì Search and get directions to all campus facilities using Google Maps
‚óè Emergency ‚Äì Get instant access to IIT security and safety services
‚óè Academic Calendar ‚Äì View the upcoming Academic Calendar
‚óè MyParking ‚Äì Access parking services
‚óè Shuttle Bus ‚Äì Access IIT‚Äôs free shuttle bus schedule
‚óè CTA ‚Äì Access CTA services and schedules
‚óè Divvy ‚Äì Access the Divvy bike locations on campus
‚óè Social Media ‚Äì Access IIT videos on YouTube, access Facebook links & view and poste to IIT Twitter
‚óè Jobs4Hawks ‚Äì Access job opportunities
‚óè Greek Life ‚Äì Access Greek Life sites to view activities and events
‚óè HawkLink ‚Äì Reload TechCash
‚óè Heath & Wellness ‚Äì Access links to Student Health and the Center for Disabilities
‚óè International Center ‚Äì Access the link to the International Center
