title: MindGuru Psychological Counseling
description:
The android application ‚ÄúMindGuru‚Äù is under the ownership of the company ABSOLUTE MIND PRIVATE LTD, INDIA. Also the website www.mindgurulive.com and mobile application is developed and maintained by the company itself. 
MindGuru, an online Web and Android/ios platform, provides the service, online counseling for mental wellness. 
All the practices doing here is evidence based and by accredited, licensed professionals like Psychologists and Clincial Psychologists. Online and direct sessions includes counseling, psychotherapy and training
The modes of counseling here
1.	Direct counseling happening at clinics
2.	Online counseling happening with the aid of website and application.
3.	Chat & Text sessions

Online Counseling is a new idea to many people, so we've made the experience as simple as possible. It provides all the freedom for people, easier to open up like in an office environment and can build a rapport between Counselor and Client. What you need, just a smart phone or computer with a good internet connection.
We offer the full spectrum of services in the field of Psychology, to help people and their mental health. Here the Counselors can explore your behavior and mental processes, including perception, cognition, attention, emotion, intelligence, motivation, brain functioning, and personality. Let's have a look at some of the services here.
‚Ä¢	Anxiety & Stress Issues   
‚Ä¢	Personality & Mood swings 
‚Ä¢	Drug, De-addiction
‚Ä¢	Sexual Dysfunctions
‚Ä¢	Learning, Memory & Intellectual Problems
‚Ä¢	Others
WHY MINDGURU RIGHT FOR YOU?
Here, Counselors are very compassionate and can empathize with a client's pain and difficulties. They are able to put clients at ease and make people feel comfortable with problem solving techniques. 
CLIENT ORIENTED
We designed the Platform like user doesn't need any technical knowledge for accessing services. Our Multi-language platform will be launched soon.
PASSION FOR TECHNOLOGY
With the help of innovation and Passion for technology, we are constantly striving to provide solutions for the specific needs of the people and are adaptable quickly to the changing world around us.
PROFESSIONAL AND PROCEDURAL EXPERTISE
With The help of mind experts, together we can avail the counseling process for a better standard of mental health of people in the society. We provide training for our Counselors on a regular basis to allow them to stay current with the latest technology and trends.
WE DELIVER ONLY SOLUTIONS FOR THE PEOPLE, NEVER BUSINESS
Our service charges can meet only the maintenance and running cost of the platform. We respect affordability of the users and at the same time Professional service payments for Counselors, while delivering the best solutions for the people and their mental health.

title: PECS - Speech Therapy for Toddlers
description:
PECS (Picture Exchange Communication System) is for speech therapy, it is unique AAC (alternative/augmentative communication system) developed in the USA developed for use with children with speech impediments. It is classified within the principle called speech and skills development and has been used with hundreds of autistic children in the United States and many other countries.

It is a system that does not require complex materials or high teaching methods, and does not contain expensive tools, comprehensive tests, or even costly staff or high parenting training, and is used in various different environments, including home, class and society.

This system was applied with children at the age of 18 months, and over time it was applied with adults, due to the difficulties faced by speech therapists in implementing training programs to communicate with autistic children to develop speech and communication skills in many Over the years, workers took months to try to develop the skill of kinetic / vocal imitation.

Children with autism spectrum disorder are not strongly influenced by social reinforcement, so it had to start communicative exercises with functional actions that engage the child to interact with reward reinforcements.

Speech therapists have tried to teach and train silent children to speak, and this type of training usually begins with trying to teach the child to look at the trainer's face or eyes, and then reward the child for producing many sounds, then the stage of imitating sounds and another studying the child to mix these sounds into words The coach chooses it.

According to this type of education, it will take many weeks to solve the problem of delayed speech in children if it is not many months, and during this long time, the child does not have a useful way to communicate with others to express his basic needs. 

During this long period the children did not have appropriate or reasonable means to express their basic needs, and thus they expressed their needs in a variety of poorly adapted ways, and this exacerbated the children's speech delay, then the trainers in this sign language program stopped themselves as they encountered difficulty with children who did not imitate efficiently And when they tried to apply the picture teaching system, they found that children had excessive hand movements, which they imagined the process of reading the communicative message, and also children did not initiate exchange of communication.

Some language training programs include Alternative programs for communication, such as sign language, for example, but PECS is a system that includes skills that are a prerequisite for teaching this system similar to those related to speech training.

Benefits:

‚Ä¢ Speech therapy using PECS technique.
‚Ä¢ Making the autistic child easily communicate with the outside world using easy AAC app.
‚Ä¢ Improving communication and developing communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Treatment of delayed speech in children.
‚Ä¢ Useful in pronunciation, articulation, and speech improvement in children.
‚Ä¢ It can be used for deaf and dumb people.
‚Ä¢ Excellent in speaking sessions for children.
‚Ä¢ Increase and raise the degree of communication in children.
‚Ä¢ Reducing speech impediments

Advantages:

‚Ä¢ Providing more than 1,300 talking cards.
‚Ä¢ Ease of use with simple interface.
‚Ä¢ Ability to add or modify an existing card.
‚Ä¢ Control the text of the card.
‚Ä¢ multilingual to help more children.
‚Ä¢ Control the way cards are displayed according to the required level.
‚Ä¢ Full support for the Arabic language, as it was not available previously.

Speech therapists recommend that parents should use PECS - Speech Therapy for Toddlers app in children's speech sessions, especially teaching speech for late children using PECS, and the application also helps a lot in the process of communication.

title: My Speaker AAC Lite
description:
MySpeaker gives the user the ability to create phrases,sentences, statements or just words that are typed into the my phrase editing window and spoken. In the case you want to use the phrase again just press the Spk button on the keyboard.

On entering the first letter of your new phrase all phrases with the same start word will appear in the stored phrases window, simply scroll up or down with the arrow cursor keys to highlight the phrase and then press the Select key, the text is copied into my phrases and spoken for you.
Keyword recognition is included which can find the word within a stored phrase.
 
Editing of the typed phrase is achieved with the left and right arrow cursor keys and letter deletion is provided by the DEL key. Double or multiply spaces are not allowed, entering such causes an advisory beep to be given. The Lite version is limited to 5 phrases, the speech cannot be turned off and the App terminates after 15 minutes.

The TalkingTablet MySpeaker is designed to provide a voice for a person who has either lost their voice through some disability or has speech difficulty.It have been used very successfully during initial user trials as a great tool for helping children with learning difficulties in both creating sentences, getting the soundings of words as well as for users with dyslexia in pronunciation of speech.

Important: Ensure that text to speech is turned on in the Settings menu. Select the voice gender from within the selected TTS voice settings.
descriptionHTML:
MySpeaker gives the user the ability to create phrases,sentences, statements or just words that are typed into the my phrase editing window and spoken. In the case you want to use the phrase again just press the Spk button on the keyboard.

On entering the first letter of your new phrase all phrases with the same start word will appear in the stored phrases window, simply scroll up or down with the arrow cursor keys to highlight the phrase and then press the Select key, the text is copied into my phrases and spoken for you.
Keyword recognition is included which can find the word within a stored phrase.

Editing of the typed phrase is achieved with the left and right arrow cursor keys and letter deletion is provided by the DEL key. Double or multiply spaces are not allowed, entering such causes an advisory beep to be given. The Lite version is limited to 5 phrases, the speech cannot be turned off and the App terminates after 15 minutes.

The TalkingTablet MySpeaker is designed to provide a voice for a person who has either lost their voice through some disability or has speech difficulty.It have been used very successfully during initial user trials as a great tool for helping children with learning difficulties in both creating sentences, getting the soundings of words as well as for users with dyslexia in pronunciation of speech.

Important: Ensure that text to speech is turned on in the Settings menu. Select the voice gender from within the selected TTS voice settings.
summary: TalkingTablet MySpeaker is a word & phrases speaking & recorded app for aphasia.

title: Birdhouse ‚Äì for Special Needs
description:
For thousands of parents around the world, Birdhouse for Special Needs is among the most valuable resources in their arsenal, keeping them organized and in control for their children.


Keep everything about ongoing care in one simple timeline. Organize behavior notes, nutrition, medical and doctor information, therapies, schedules, interventions, and more.  Discover patterns and figure out how to improve care. Have this information at your fingertips anytime you need it, and share this information with anyone who needs to see it. Regain some control and sanity and watch how your care and outcomes improve and everyone's life becomes better.


************************


Top rated Birdhouse apps have been featured on Parents.com, HuffingtonPost, Smart Apps for Special Needs, Generation Rescue, Autism Speaks, The Friendship Circle, and more!


Rated Top 10 Special Needs apps by Friendship Circle and Top 5 Organizational Apps for Special Needs Parents by Smart Apps for Special Needs.


************************


"This app is a dream for any parent with a child on the Autism spectrum or really any child with special needs." -Smart Apps for Special Needs


WITH BIRDHOUSE, YOU CAN:


-Keep a daily behavioral journal
-Activate reminders to stay in control of your day
-Track new diets (gluten free, casein free, GAPS, etc)
-Share info with your spouse, caregiver, a grandparent, teacher(s) and/or therapist(s)
-Create and share summaries with overviews of important background and health information
-Manage alternative diets and eating habits
-Track your child's sleep cycles
-Identify what causes meltdowns
-Organize medications and supplements
-Record notes from therapy sessions
-Account for poop & dietary infractions
-Stay in control of your child's progress


‚Ä¶ and so much more! 


***********************


Managing developmental delays, learning disabilities, behavioral challenges, or something similar‚Äã?


Take back control with Birdhouse. We‚Äôve designed a helpful, easy-to-use website and mobile app designed for parents, caregivers, and healthcare providers who support individuals with special needs.


Easily keep track of meds, therapies, behaviors, sleeping habits, poop, meltdowns, eating & diets, or anything that you want to keep a record of, so you can figure out what's working and what needs to be changed, and have access to anything whenever you need it.


People have used this for all of the following things, and more, to great success;
ADD/ADHD, SPD (sensory processing disorder), FAS, PANDAS, Anxiety, Williams Syndrome, Rhett Syndrome, Cystic Fibrosis, Cerebral Palsy, Down Syndrome, Dyslexia, Fragile X, Bipolar, PDD-NOS, Epilepsy, etc


Other apps by Birdhouse include:
‚Äì Birdhouse for Epilepsy
‚Äì Birdhouse for Autism
‚Äì Birdhouse for Teachers


************************


Visit us at http://birdhousehq.com/specialneeds for a full rundown of features, and testimonials from parents, teachers, and specialists who've used Birdhouse.


Feel free to email us at owl@birdhousehq.com with any questions-- there's an actual human being who monitors this email address every single day!


From our nest to yours, 


The Birdhouse Team

title: Dizzy Reader Pro
description:
So many books, so little time. Save your time and read more by using Dizzy Reader. This application uses speed reading technique that allow to start reading with max speed and comfort without needing any additional skills in speed reading. Just upload your books to device in fb2 or txt format and begin reading from 250-300 words per minute. You won't feel any difficulties with such speed of reading although it's faster than average speed in classical reading with 220 words per minute. Reading by this technique aid to less fatigue because you don't move your eyes during reading, like it does in classical reading. Also bigger font size also affects on comfort reading, that allow to read from far distance and good for people with poor eyesight. With all this, read content has better comprehension.
This application useful for students, teachers, people with poor eyesight and anybody, who likes read and who want to do it the most effectively

P.S. - You will only be able to sign in if your school has subscribed to one of Toddle‚Äôs premium plans.

Developed by experienced IB educators, Toddle is your school‚Äôs partner for all things PYP. Toddle streamlines planning, portfolios, reports, and family communication - all from one beautiful interface. Toddle is currently used by 18,000+ educators across 1000+ schools. 

Through the Toddle Student App, students can:
Document their learning journey in the form of photos, videos, galleries, audio notes etc.

In case you face any difficulties in downloading or accessing the app, please reach out to support@toddleapp.com

title: Super Spelling Free
description:
Although reading and spelling are closely related, yet learning to spell is a different process for the brain than learning to read. For at spelling everything is about putting letters in the right order.

Super Spelling helps kids aged 4 and up, as well as adults, who want to learn how to spell in a fun and compelling way. Super Spelling teaches how to spell over 400 words in 9 levels. Start out easy with three and four letter words. As the game progresses, things become more challenging.

Earn rewards like medals and stars for correctly spelled words. Use these achievements to unlock fun mini-games, like memory and word search.

The purpose of the game is to learn spelling by dragging letters into the right position below the image. Super Spelling helps in various ways. Use phonics or set letter- and colorhelp corresponding to your own level.

Super Spelling is a great way to prepare kids for K-12/P-12 and is the ideal companion for the first years in primary education. That‚Äôs why Super Spelling is used by teachers in elementary schools as well as parents who homeschool.

For everybody who needs some extra spelling practice or anyone who likes to play with language and spelling, Super Spelling is a fun app to use at home or in school. For kids or adults with dyslexia, learning disability or autism spectrum disorder Super Spelling also is an excellent help learning how to spell.

Super Spelling does more than just improve your English vocabulary. With the same ease kids and adults can learn other languages as well. Super Spelling now contains English and Dutch, but will soon also be expanded with German, French, Spanish and Italian for free!

This Super Spelling Free edition contains the first three levels for you to try out. Mini-games can be played endlessly, but are ad supported in this free edition.
